name: Mario Story
text: I recently moved into a new home where James carpet did my wood floors. I  noticed a few bad spots in my flooring in the upstairs hallway and called them to get them repaired. They said they would come and repair them, but when the guy came the first time he mentioned he did not have the right equipment to fix the flooring. So I reschedule for another day, the appointment was made and they never showed. I called them again and they came to repair the work and I showed them some other spots that needed to be repaired. He said he would come back so I made an appointment and once again they never showed.  Now by this time about 2 months have past by. I called them and now I"m having the hardest time speaking with Scarlett, she is apparantly busy with other customers.  I am disappointed with James Carpet and trust me I will not be using them in the future! If I could put ZERO STARS I would.

name: S Kern
text: Deidre was the most helpful expert I think I've ever had!  And I'm old!  Seriously, this business deserves every bit of a 5 star rating.  They were outstanding in the entire transaction.

name: Tyler Green
text: I came in looking for some kitchen tile and worked with Deidre.  She provided hands down the best customer service I've received over the past several years.  She was attentive, knowledgeable, and followed through when we had an issue with a sample the manufacturer shipped that arrived broken.  I can't say enough good things about my experience with Deidre and would recommend going to her if at all possible.  Thanks!

name: Sue Gorman
text: Deidre was great! I've gotten carpet here multiple times. They have great prices and great service.

name: Candice Musgrove
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff! A good selection of options and they will definitely take the time with you to ensure you are happy.

name: Claudia Rhen
text: Great sales!  Cooperative!

name: Pamela Cox
text: Our experience with James Carpets was outstanding throughout the entire process. Diedre was helpful and helped me figure out just what we needed, and the crew of Preston, Greg and James Dean was superb! These guys worked hard to make sure we were happy with the job, even taking the extra time to make sure all of our floors were "squeak-free" before installing the new carpeting. This is our second 5 Star experience with James Carpets, and we highly recommend them to anyone who wants an excellent product and terrific customer service.

name: Jeffrey and Morgan Thomas
text: That's was the easiest most enjoyable experience we could have ever hoped for in picking flooring and tile. Scarlett is the best. Thank you so much. We recommend James Carpets over everyone.

name: lawton wade
text: Have used James Flooring 3-4 times and in different houses for both hardwoods and carpet.  The owner is a good man and his folks do really good work at the best prices Ive found . James Flooring also follows up to make sure you are pleased with their work - its surprising how few businesses do this. These folks are the best Ive found.

name: Brier Armstrong
text: Friendly people. A way better deal and carpet from Lowe's or Home Depot!

name: leslie sherban
text: This is my third remodel and I wouldn't have wanted to do it without James Carpets. I love how friendly everyone is and how fast and effortless they made the job. Thank you!

name: Freedom Found Farm
text: Excellent customer service...great people and friendly too!!!

name: liberty Kincannon
text: Great people and have a lot of options. Will go here over anywhere else for my flooring needs.

name: Ashley D
text: Alan helped me order my flooring. He is so wonderful! Thank you! Great price!

name: M K
text:
Disappointing service.

Our tiling work is only 1/2 way complete so I cannot review the work only that the workers who came to our home have been very nice and my complaint has nothing to do with them.

Our tile work was supposed to be completed yesterday 10/8.  It did not get complete because some of the wood did not match our floor (100% understandable!) We were told they would be back this morning to complete the work.  My husband takes the morning off of work and we have a photographer scheduled at 1pm to take photos to put our house on the market.  The morning passes and we never hear from anyone.  Finally my husband messages the worker directly and he said that they erew coming this afternoon instead.  Someone from James Carpets was supposed to reach out to us.  My husband has to take the full day off work and now we need to wait to put our house on the market.  Here's where the problem happened:

I call the store to see what happened.  When I explain the situation to the lady who answered her reply was "well, those phones fail us all the time dont they?  Is there anything else you need?" I asked for a Manager to call me. Someone called about an hour later and his response was almost unbelievable.  He explained that they had to change the wood. Great, but the issue here is that no one communicated with us that there would be a delay.  He talks in circles for a few minutes first blaming us, then the workers then he says he has "no idea why they didn't come this morning" ?? What?  We all understand why they didn't come the issue is with why someone didn't communicate this to us which caused a major inconvenience.

I do not recommend this company.  Good customer service is NOT difficult at all but obviously not something that they care about.

name: Noa Williams
text: Our builder installed hardwoods that was purchased from this company almost three years ago . The hardwoods were a terrible quality and extremely  difficult to maintain. After using the recommended products our floors got worse and worse. I reached out to James Carpet for help and the staff was rude and unwilling to understand my issues. I will never go with a company or builder that uses James Carpet for any of their products. It's going to be a very costly problem to rid our home of their terrible hardwoods.

name: Amanda Webster Hays
text:
Great service, affordable prices, beautiful installation!

I have worked for two separate builders spanning over the last several years, and both builders exclusively use James Carpets as their flooring & backsplash vendor.. and with great reason!  They offer the largest amount of color/material selections in their showroom with an extensive amount of knowledge for each type of product.  Scarlett, namely, has been such a big help in business and personal flooring decisions.  Not only is she extremely knowledgeable with all of the many products they offer, but she is also forthright with sharing extensive information on color variations (photos, additional samples, etc).  My husband and I also hired them to install tile, vinyl, hardwood, & backsplash into my personal home, and I'm beyond happy with their prices and completed work!

I would recommend James Carpets to anyone!!

text: Best flooring store in town!

text:
The staff is courteous, professional, helpful, and extremely cooperative.
Admittedly, we were not the easiest of customers to deal with since our timeline for flooring installation kept constantly changing. The staff accommodated us patiently every step of the way.and when we were finally ready, installed the carpet and LVP impeccably. Attention to detail, superior customer service and great quality flooring is what you get with this company. We will definitely utilize their service for future projects.

name: Oscar Rodriguez
text: With a large selection of products and a kind but down to earth sales representative, it's hard to go wrong with Randy Smalley. Even if I did not leave with any products in hand, I can definitely see this local business has anyone's next stop on their search for flooring.

name: Seth Kennedy
text: Mr. Smalley’s crew did a great job on our floor.

name: LeighAnn Gunter
text: Good place

name: Melanie Williams
text: I had a positive experience prior so hired Kevin again. I tried to reach him to make things right and could not reach him via phone or text. My flooring was cut incorrectly. I have numerous spots where you can see the slab. Toilets were not correctly re-installed. House was left a total mess. Floors were filthy, grout and sand and debris left in my sinks and tubs. Trim was not replaced where it belonged. Hole was made in my bedroom wall, was repaired, not great. I felt I was taken advantage of regarding charges to remove subfloor. I questioned the high rate and was told it was because it could take days, it took hours yet I wasn’t offered any relief.

name: Alex
text: Kevin is prompt and very professional. He arrived on time and notified me in advance when he would be here and what he would be doing. He tore out my old plastic master shower and tiled in a beautiful new one for me. The only negative is my water bill is going to go up because I love my shower now.10/10 highly recommended for tile in shower work.

name: Meredith Zywno
text: Kevin and his team recently replaced some laminate flooring in two rooms of our house with hardwoods. Kevin arrived on time and got the job done well within the expected timeline. He and his team were extremely courteous and professional, and his office manager was very easy to work with. We are very happy with how our floors turned out and will definitely be calling WCR in the future.

resp.text: Meredith, thank you so much for your positive review!

name: Dra Coleman
text: The quality of work is very poor.  The quality of work could have been mitigated if problems  we're shared with the owner when discovered.  You  can not suggest or make comments unless you pay for his and son mistakes.  This guy does not listen and have an answer for everything.  I would not recommend this company to anyone else.  I am having to hire someone else to correct his errors with the wood floors installed.

name: Larry Levitt
text: Kevin and his crew work hard to provide quality service in a polite, professional manner. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Larry, thank you for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Caryn B
text: Kevin and his crew did an excellent job remodeling our bathtub into a walk in shower. He was kind enough, and patient enough, to work around our crazy hours and scheduling to get the job done. Only one little hiccup with the plumbing but he just called in another plumber and was back on track in no time! Job well done gentlemen!

resp.text: Thank you Caryn for your kind words! It makes us happy that you are pleased with our work.

name: Ivy Heffelfinger

William Boggs

We couldn't be happier with our result and they were very cost efficient. I will absolutely be using these guys for any flooring project in the future. If I could give more than five stars I would! :-)

name: Susan Upton
text: Had an incredible experience using this company. They got everything in when they said they would and were very easy to communicate with. Finished look was 10x better than I imagined! Highly recommend

name: Sarah Donnell
text: Paul was great to work with! Really knows his stuff. The instal only took a little over an hour and they were super friendly and efficient! We are so happy with our new carpet. Highly recommend!

name: Mary Dutta
text: Ww had an excellent experience with this company. Paul was very responsive and clear up front about the process. Buck and his crew were prompt, pleasant, and did a beautiful job. The price was reasonable and the results outstanding. Highly recommend.

name: Lora Gaxiola
text: Paul was responsive and easy to work with. He presented several options to fit our budget. The work was done promptly, neatly, and efficiently and we're so happy with the results!

name: Sarah LeCroy
text: So happy with my floors. I chose to go with a darker grey flooring that is scratch proof and waterproof. I have a black lab, so these floors will be so much better than the dingy carpet I had. Paul was very prompt and even came to my condo to show me samples. I never even had to go in the store, everyone came to me! I called Homewood carpet and flooring, and the same afternoon I ordered my floors. Buk and his helpers were on time and did a fantastic job. They cleaned up very well after laying the floors and were respectful of my furniture and belongings. I live in a 750~ sq ft. Condo, approximately 3/4 of the condo flooring was being redone, and took 10 hours from start to finish. I would highly recommend Homewood Carpet and Flooring. You can’t beat the quality of floors, the timeliness and the accountability they give you for their price. Thank you!

name: Elizabeth Adams
text: Very responsive and helpful! Helped us out in a pinch when our first carpet installer backed out just a few weeks before the project date. Directed me to a carpet that was in stock (and what I wanted) so that the project could move forward on the timeline our business needed. At the install, they discovered an unexpected floor issue which required us to make a last minute change and he handled that and found an available carpet for us. Went above and beyond to make sure our timeline was met! Super nice guys did the install. Great attitudes and a pleasure to work with.

name: Naomi Smitherman
text:
I was pleased with the whole process.  I needed carpet stretched.  I got a fair quote for the work and it was completed sooner than expected.
The two men who stretched the carpet were prompt, courteous, quick workers and they did a great job.  My floors look so much better.

name: Melanie Clark
text: Foo did an amazing job with helping me pick out quality flooring for two basement rooms. He gave a great price and was quick with getting me scheduled. The communication was great through the whole process. He was easy to work with. His team was efficient and very pleasant to deal with. I would definitely recommend!

name: Cody Hirsberg
text: We decided to use Homewood Carpet & Flooring based on the referral of a trusted builder. Tyler was excellent to work with regarding sales and selection. He came by the house for measurements and then met us at the showroom to review his recommendations and to make a flooring selection. Foo then organized the install and, because we were in a bind with guests arriving in a few days, was able to install the carpet a day sooner than expected.  Overall, Homewood Carpet and Flooring exceeded expectations which is why they earned this 5-star review.

name: Ann Langley
text: Paul was extremely helpful and responsive throughout our decision making and installation process.   The installation crew was courteous and very hardworking.  Everything was cleaned up and put back in place when they finished.  I have already referred this company to several friends!

name: Alexandra Baugh
text: Got carpet replaced in 3 rooms. Very fast and good quality work! Would definitely use again and recommend. Fair pricing and kind staff.

name: Wendy Morell
text: I’ve had three jobs done in the last month: carpeting stairs, refinishing original hardwood floors, and laying vinyl flooring. All three looked amazing when finished. The people who completed the work were kind and knowledgeable. I would highly HIGHLY recommend to anyone for any job, and if I have any flooring needs in the future, I will definitely be going back to Foo!

name: Austin Wilson
text: Amazing customer service! Fair pricing, they did a great job, and in a timely manner. Will use again!

name: Shannon George
text: I called on Saturday and was told someone would come out Monday to look at our floors. No one showed up, no one called to cancel, no one called to reschedule.

name: Erika Olds
text: Paul was very nice an easy to work with excellent customer service.This company has great pricing and did an excellent job on my mom's floors. They went above and beyond to make sure she was satisfied I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Mandy Willig
text: Paul and his team replaced our carpet with beautiful engineered hardwood flooring. They provided amazing service throughout the process, from home consultation through the final walk through. We will not hesitate to recommend them to our friends and family!

name: Mark Grissom
text: We had an urgent need entering into a new home. Foo and crew responded same day, made selections easy, had it installed before we could get through the quoting process of big box. The installers were friendly, efficient, and the work was superb with exactly the product we wanted. What else can I say! Oh, above all else wife loves the new carpet and quality work.

name: carol harris
text: From the moment I walked in the door I was completely impressed with Homewood Carpet & Flooring. Not only was Paul knowledgeable about the flooring, he was genuinely interested in my specific needs for flooring. He was completely helpful  in the product selection that would best suit my needs. He stayed in communication with me throughout the entire process. His install team was  right on time and did a beautiful job. The guys were extremely thorough. I was really impressed with their attention to detail. They finished my (whole house) flooring job on time and left my home clean and in order. I have no reservations at all in recommending the guys at Homewood Carpet & Flooring to my friends and family.

name: 9 Bachelors
text: Great job all the way. Excellent service, accurate quotes, very professional, polite and thorough installation team.

name: Greg Yemm
text: Quality, prices, and service were all 5 stars. The owner was very responsive any time I had questions too. Definitely would recommend.

name: Kelly Arrington
text: Enthusiastic crew who did a fantastic job on matching the rest of my floors and amazing job on my stairwell. The were timely, efficient and did a high quality job!

name: Brian Murphy
text: You are in good hands with Paul and his team.  First class service and a job well done.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking for flooring work.  Paul’s team sanded and re-stained my floors.  The work was of the highest quality.  Will definitely work with them again in the future.

name: Corie Clark
text: Foo was easy to work with and very responsive. The carpet and vinyl plank in out basement looks great.

name: Bryan Stack
text:
I highly recommend them. Paul helped me select the flooring to replace my carpet. He was very prompt in providing an estimate and getting the job started.
The installers did an excellent job removing the carpeting and installing my vinyl floors. My condo looks 100% better. I will choose them again when I sell my condo and purchase another home.

name: Britney Henry
text: Paul and his staff did a wonderful job with our flooring project! We had our red oak floors refinished and also had our stairs repaired. They took our very outdated and yellowed flooring and transformed it into a beautiful brown/gray color that is exactly what we had envisioned. They even mixed two of the stains to get the exact color we described. One room had several areas of stains that was so bad I wasn’t sure they would ever look normal, but they were able to make the stains completely disappear. They also replaced a broken part of one step and repaired the stair treads so that they no longer squeak! We are completely satisfied with the job that Homewood Carpet and Flooring did for us and we appreciate their professionalism and thoroughness.

name: felicity79
text: I was unsure of what flooring I wanted, Paul was very helpful on helping me decide to refinish my hardwoods or to choose a new floor. He came to my house to show me color swatches and was willing to come back a second time when I thought I had changed my mind. I ended up going to his store and we picked out a beautiful floor that I am so proud of. Installation only took maybe 4 hours for my 900 ft. square floor. I would choose them again for my flooring needs. Will be redoing my kitchen floor soon, and definitely plan on calling Homewood Carpet and Flooring.

name: Susan Copeland
text: I have used Homewood carpet and flooring three separate times now for my home renovations and each time they exceed my expectations. Both Foo and Paul are really lovely to work with and provide clear communication so that I always knew exactly what was going to occur. And with a German Shepard puppy and 3 teenage boys, they have always guided me on the best flooring and carpet that would keep up with our chaotic and busy household :)!

name: Tracy Thomas
text: Paul and the guys at Homewood carpet and flooring did a wonderful job removing and installing new carpet in our upstairs! I even had to reschedule them and they fit me in on a Saturday at a moments notice! Everyone I worked with was professional and timely.

name: Kristina Martin
text: So compassionate and helpful. We had a time crunch and extenuating circumstances and they worked within those and did the job well.

He came and took measurements same day and we had a great quote within hours. Paul updated us on ever detail until carpet was here and job was done. Installing team was professional and friendly. Paul came after they finished to do a walk through and checked everything. So blown away by the personable staff, quality products, and thorough service they provided!!!!

Having spent three weeks trying to get the job done with a big box store with all types of exceptions, it was a pleasure to have the entire process done is less time.  Highly recommend this team.

name: Blake Butler
text: Everything was fine until it was time to do the work.  We wanted vinyl flooring removed and replaced and communicated from the beginning that there were several layers to be removed.  Andy said no problem and we ordered the vinyl and waited a week for the measuring.  After measure they said it would be a little more expensive, which isn't unreasonable.  However, a week later when the crew came to install, they flat out refused to do the work due to possible damage to the sub-floor.  They had a solution to sub-floor damage, but would not do it.  They only offered to put the vinyl down on top of the 4-5 other layers and cut the bottom of the doors.  So now I've wasted 2 weeks when I could've found somebody else to do it.  Extremely frustrated by the lack of communication between sales, measuring crew, and demo/install crews.  Now I own some useless vinyl after they refused to refund me.

name: Tyron Newton
text: I love my new luxury vinyl plank flooring.

name: Mike Dominick
text: Decent price quick install

name: Angela Schram
text: Not a good place to get carpets. We bought flooring for our house a year ago and I’ve called and left messages several times but the manager will not return my calls to even hear my concerns and get a resolution. Our carpet is pulling everywhere and we’re not happy. Obviously they’re not interested in customer service since they can’t even return a phone call. That’s just bad business. I would not recommend or use them again. There’s plenty of other places around Huntsville that I’m sure would treat their customers better.

name: A new life
text: I'm not sure how they stay in business. I'm a small business owner myself. We were to have carpet installed Saturday the 20th when my husband was off work, they did not show up, even after many calls we were told they were still coming. Fast forward to 5:30pm I got home from work and no carpet. I left a message for them to call and let me know what was up. I worked Monday also but have access to my phone, no call. I called on one of my breaks, apparently they don't check their messages because nobody knew anything. I work my small business and a second job, so I work 7 days a week. They told me they could be here Tuesday the 23rd and have the carpet installed by 12 pm so I could be able to keep my appointments in my office in the afternoon as I was off the morning at my second job. That didn't happen. The 2 that came to install didn't have all the materials needed for installation. So they left to get it at 11am and didn't return until 1pm. The job was finished at 2:20pm and I am out $250 for the appointments I had to cancel. And no consideration for my time. I don't recommend using Rock Bottom unless you are at rock bottom.

name: Bryan Minchew
text: Do not do business with them. Check the Better Business Bureau first. Look at Face Book. I don't see how their still in business.

resp.text: My. Minchew is a disgruntled carpet installer who is no longer working for Rock Bottom Carpets. We wish him well at his next place of employment.

name: Tyson DeAngelis
text: Good prices. Quick service. Quality install

name: Jody Thomas
text:
Edit: they sent a very experienced gentleman out to fix the issues. He removed a
Tool from under the carpet and knocked the tack strips down much better than I could (they first told me to do it) there is something else under the carpet on the steps. But I guess we will have to live with it. Raising my score some after they sent a good person out for fix.

TICKED OFF! THEY WON'T RESPOND OVER AN ISSUE OF SAFETY

SHARP TACKS EVERYWHERE!
My 5 year old son can't even play without getting hurt! I'm so mad they don't even want to say anything to me out of the way. It's personal now after my son is bleeding!

STILL PICKING UP CIGARETTE BUTTS AND WHOLE CIGARETTES DROPPED. I even asked them to picked them up before leaving. We cant even walk through our house barefooted. They left tools and other objects UNDER THE CARPET. Carpet is coming up in areas.

resp.text: The issue of tack strip is common. There is tack strip around every wall and at every doorway. This is easily resolved be taking a mallet and knocking the strip down where you step.

name: Terri French
text:
I wouldn't use them again.  They came and installed and left a bit of a mess.  Then when I vacuumed for the first time, my vacuum caught a "nub" they had not trimmed and the carpet ran.  They came and put a new piece in which was darker than the original carpeting.  Also, I noticed a dark spot after they left, it felt stiff like glue.  I called and they were supposed to send someone out to look at it but never did.

Ok, the mgr called and came out today.  They are going to try to remedy the situation.  So, that does give them major points and if they do a good job, I would certainly reconsider using them again.  Good customer service goes a long way in my book.

They came out today (a mere week after the mgr called and came out) and relayed the hallway, without piecing it this time. Everything looks good, like it should have the first time.  But, I am pleased and would recommend them.

name: A G
text: AWESOME!!! If it isn't right they will make it right! LOVE MY NEW FLOORS!! Thank you Rock Bottom Carpets!! Installers Todd and Clay were the bomb!  Big thank you to the manager Mr. Mark!!!  Thank you thank you thank you!!! Would definitely recommend RBC off Bob Wallace!

name: Marlyse Knezevich
text: Poor customer service.  Was told by sales guy that my husband and I couldn't install the flooring ourselves. Because it was too complicated.  WTH? Shouldn't that be our decision if we pay for the flooring? But he wouldn't give us a price/without installation.

resp.text: We also think it would be poor customer service if we did not warn people that the product they were looking at was not a DIY product no matter how good of a handyman her husband thinks he is

name: Amelia Hreha
text: I would absolutely use them again. I went in on a Thursday just before closing and our installation was completed the following Tuesday. I had gotten a quote from Lowe's and Home Depot and both were at least 2-4 weeks out and about $400 more expensive for lower quality products. I got a great deal from Rock Bottom Carpets on a quality carpet and with the money I saved was able to afford the best padding offered. Mark and Raj were such a pleasure to work with. They didn't pressure me to purchase anything and answered all my questions about the products. Raj helped me find the best carpet to fit our budget and needs and Mark was quick to respond to any questions or concerns that we had. I'm not sure why anyone would choose to not support their local businesses especially when they provide better products and services.

name: Priscilla's African Apparel
text: Great staff

name: Kandy Winsette
text:
Installer left a hugh seam visual. Left a mess.
When installer drop carpet on the floor upstairs it caused sheet rock damage to my dining room on first floor under the bedroom. Took pics to RBC they had us email pics so they could turn them in to someone that handles this. He called today and said someone can come back out to fix seam which he agreed was bad. But said his insurance would not cover other damage the installer caused. I wish I could attach my pics so the public could see for yourselves. Would not recommend them to no one.

name: Brandie Dorsett
text: The initial customer service was good. But the follow up was not.

name: William Gallo
text: I was skeptical at first based on the BBB comments and reviews I saw. We decided to still try it out based on the competitive pricing and the installation timeframe. They did an amazing job. We carpeted two bedrooms and put wood laminate in the office and the guys who installed them were amazingly good. They were clean, well experienced guys. Paul kelley was the installation guy accompanied by klein. I would recommend rock bottom carpets to anyone if they keep using pro guys like the two who did our stuff.

name: Sonya Mertz
text: Great customer service

name: Rachel Kepler
text: I will never use them again. Not only did they knowingly send a sick man to my house (he vomited RIGHT IN MY FRONT FLOWER BED!) My husband had to help move the carpet in and out of the house and move the furniture, which I was told moving furniture was only a courtesy and that was after the fact fyi and they left a mess of left over carpet in my bathroom and the tub?!?!. The manager told us, "well the job he did was good,right?" BUT YOU SENT A SICK MAN TO MY HOUSE,ALONE. We got nothing,a run around apology was pretty much it and an offer for a discount on future need, UMMMMM,NO. I will never use them again,my husband did half the work and,the installer(sub contractor) was very nice,yet he was sent to do a job even though he was sick and the manager was rude. So,next time,I will go with a company that has empathy for the people they work with and for.

name: Mark Bounds
text: Inexpensive flooring store

name: Keith Jeffries
text: Great experience with Flooring America in Huntsville.  Dock and his entire team were fantastic to work with, when we replaced all the carpet in our home with tile.  Even when one installer (sub-contractor) was an issue,  Dock jumped in, fixed the problem and replaced the installer...no questions asked...I'd give them 5 Stars for that alone.  But the product, price, and customer service all deserve the 5 Star rating.

name: Sheila B
text: Flooring America installed carpet and laminate flooring for us 2 years ago.  The staff  helped us decide the best flooring for our family and the installers did a great job.  Our carpet and laminate look as good today as they did the day they installed it!

name: Bryan Minchew
text: It's always a pleasure coming here. I would recommend it to everyone!!!

name: Sharon Maguire
text: We have used Flooring America of Huntsville on several different occasions with complete satisfaction. We have had wooden flooring, carpeting, and porcelain tile installed. Each time the quality of the product was excellent, and the installation process was professional and seamless. We would highly recommend them without reservation.

name: Angela Skipper
text: We have been extremely happy with our decision to purchase from Flooring America, as well as the flooring choice we made. We decided to use LVT and went with the brand recommended by Doc Leatherwood. We have had to pull it up twice in the last six months because of two separate, major leaks and were able to put it right back down with no damage to the floor. Doc is extremely knowledgeable, very thorough, and follows up as he says he will. Their installation rates are great and we are very happy with their installer. We have made two separate purchases, about a year apart, and will definitely be going to them when it is time to update our remaining two bathrooms and kitchen. Highly recommend them!

text: We had the best experience with Issis and Sons, they were super helpful as we weighed different carpet options and Gary worked really hard to get our install set up asap. Top quality service, pricing, and carpet. We highly recommend!

name: Sandra
text: Very friendly and helpful. Lots of great selections

name: Luciano Costa
text: We went look for flooring for our new home under construction. Between our Saturday outfit, the Latino name and the accent the salesman kept insisting that we were on the wrong store and this was a "high end" satellite of their business ("no offense"). Offense taken, along with my business.

name: M. Smith
text: Great furniture selection, friendly staff, excellent customer service. They really go the extra mile for you as a customer, would highly recommend!

name: David Gibson
text:
AWESOME COMPANY.  Great selection and pricing, they really take time to know the use of something prior to making a recommendation.
Family owned and operated.

name: Kassady Gibson
text: Such a beautiful store with amazing furniture and rugs!  They have a great selection of both traditional and current.  Plus, their staff is so helpful.

name: Roderick Howe
text: Very nice

name: Mark Mcdaniel
text: They were very patient with me in scheduling the work. The prices are reasonable. We are enjoying our new carpet and vinyl.

name: Diana Hall Bixby
text: EXTREMELY helpful and great customer service.  The crew was very nice and made sure everything was cleaned up. I highly recommend Ben Baker Flooring. Clark Always takes care of me. Thanks guys!!

name: Kelli Wallace
text: I had flooring installed from this company in 2015. Upon completion there were gaps in the flooring, my moldings were not put back, I requested they build my floors up to be an even transition between the tiles and wood flooring which they did not, the columns in my house were not accounted for when they did their measurements and the transitions between the floors were not properly laid so they continuously shifted and came loose. After two years of fighting to get these things fixed, it was finally somewhat decent. But the gaps between the flooring became an issue and soon started to separate and pull up. They came out and looked at the flooring in 2018 and agreed to lay new flooring for me, I picked out my new flooring bc the design I had previously ordered was no longer available. Apparently the new floor I picked was back ordered so it took months to come in, and once it did I was not notified, so I had to call and call to get my installation set up. Needless to say, there were more issues and as of right now, I still do not have the transition from my kitchen into my dining room bc the installer said that someone else would be handling that and when I called that person they laughed and said that was incorrect and now noone will answer my calls.

name: Willie Stanford
text: The staff is very helpful and friendly even they're give you suggestion if it is a do it yourself project

name: Tommy Davenport
text: Professional flooring

name: Karen Gardner
text: Professional, informative  and reliable!

name: Karen Rae Gardner

name: John Briscoe
text: Purchased tile and plumbing from Pro-Source outstanding experience. Scottie English was sales person she made it flow smooth and easy like purchased should.

name: Proud Parent
text:
I bought cabinets from ProSource at the end of August. The date of install would be Sept 1st - 5th. I am still waiting on Sept 25th for the cabinets to arrive. No date can be given... I have told them I am waiting to sell the house and the cabinets are costing me the mortgage. How long will I have to wait? No one can tell me. I have several interested buyers in the home right now. This company does not care about you or your project.

***UPDATE SEPT 29TH***
I had the pleasure to work with Trent a ProSource employee. He was great to find the answers for me that I did not have. I had the company delivering the cabinets calling me providing me updates directly. As a customer if I could go through ProSource myself I would. I appreciate the follow through.

resp.text:
Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Client and member satisfaction is our top priority and we’re happy we were able to get in contact with you to discuss finding a resolution. We appreciate your feedback and communication with the showroom as well as your patience and understanding.

name: Brad McClellan
text: Large selection. Not pushy salespeople. Knowledgeable.

Made sure I understood what type of flooring was recommended for Bathroom and Kitchen and what is water proof and what is not. This is where you need to go for your flooring if you are not sure if you're getting what you need.

text:
I have used Ray on three homes and he is absolutely the best. Not sure what a parking lot issue has to do with a business's quality of workmanship.
The prices are fair, service is great and their selection is huge.

name: Trisha Smith
text: We renovated our Grandmother’s house last year and used R&D flooring to install our flooring throughout our house. These guys are the best! If you are building or renovating a home, go down and speak with Ray. You will not be disappointed!

name: Amy justice
text: We were so pleased with R&D Flooring for our recent renovation.  Excellent selection,  great customer service,  exceptional installation crew! Thanks,  Ray and Crew!!

resp.text: Thanks Amy it was a pleasure help you out!!

name: ray langston
text: I am the owner of this place and would like to explain the bad reviews. These were truck drivers that were tresspassing and got their feelings hurt and left bad reviews. Neither of the 3 have ever stepped foot inside my store

name: kyle
text:
If you support truckers (the back bone of America, the ones that bring you food and all the essentials you need) do not shop here. They will boot you and say you owe them 500 bucks to remove it. They say they have signs up to warn truckers to not park or turn around in their lot but the sign is 100 feet off the road and against the building, you can't see that till you are already in the lot. The other 4 signs they have are 1"×2" signs you can't read till you are right on top of them and from what I could see those only said no parking. If you really wanted to till truckers not to use your lot you should put your sign front and center next to the roadway where people can see it.

They clearly can't make enough money on flooring so they have to prey on truck driver to make their mortgage. This place is a cash grab, and a place of extortion.

resp.text: Again sir I have had nothing but problems from disrespectful truckers since I opened my business. If you can’t read a 4 foot by 8 foot sign asking you to not park or turn around there then maybe you are in the wrong line of work. Maybe an optometrist visit is in your future.

name: Charles Wright
text: It's a sad company that preys on unsuspecting truck drivers.

resp.text: If this truck driver could learn to read and had a little respect for others property then this truck driver would have not had any problems. There are 5 signs telling truck drivers they cant trespass on this property yet some think laws and rules do not apply to them. When a driver knowingly tresspasses is he really unsuspecting?

name: George Reed
text: Donna was so helpful and patient.

resp.text:

Cheers,
Brian's Flooring & Design
Brian's Flooring & Design

name: Courtney Hale
text: Brian's is extremely professional!  We have used them the last several years with many of our clients.  From design appointments to installation they are top notch and stand behind their quality and workmanship.  They have been flexible with our client's desires and always help us achieve the final vision in the most cost-effective way possible.  Thanks to Brian's for their continued contribution to our happy clients!

resp.text: Courtney, what great compliments!  We strive to be the best in the Birmingham area for flooring.  We enjoy seeing happy clients!  Thank you for sharing your opinions.

name: Kimberly B
text: Wonderful experience! I never felt pressured, the staff was knowledgeable, and the selection was more than I could have ever hoped for. Everyone should buy their flooring here!!

resp.text: Thank you Kimberly for your honest opinions!  We take our flooring knowledge seriously.  We appreciate you sharing your Brian's experience with others.

name: Margaret Brazda
text:
Brian Flooring was a great resource for our renovation before moving to Hoover! They are experienced, dependable and interested in giving you what you need and for the best price!
Recently Stephanie Helms coordinated a renovation of our Master bathroom. We love what she helped us pick out for flooring and shower make over! Her tile and plumbing contractors are wonderful! I would be remiss if I didn’t thank all of them for their expert service!
We are thrilled with our updated Bath!

resp.text: Hi Margaret! We appreciate you sharing your experience with others and are enjoying the floors and tile that we completed!  Thank you again for sharing your recommendations online!

name: Sara N. Tower
text: I cannot say enough good things about Brian's Flooring! Jared went above and beyond to get a crew to my house ASAP to fix my carpet that my dog decided to do some damage to. They did a fantastic job and were able to fix the carpet instead of replacing the portion which is what I was hoping for! Thank you so much again for all of your help!

resp.text: Sara, thank you for leaving your feedback.  We think Jared does go above and beyond.  We are pleased that you are happy with your new flooring!  Hopefully your dog won't do any further damage. 😉

name: R. Cherri Pitts
text: As an architect and builder, I’ve worked with Jared and Donna on multiple custom projects, and they are wonderful to work with-super professional, always focused on quality and the details and really good people! I highly recommend them and look forward to many more projects with them in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for recognizing our Brian's team members, Jared & Donna.  We think they are great too. 😀 Thank you for sharing your experience with others who may need our services.  We appreciate your business!

name: Linda Holmes
text:
Installers did a very good job and acted professionally.
Sales rep Stephanie was nice and helpful.
I would rank 5 stars except for the fact that we had a whole box of hardwood which was told could not be returned!  It seems to me it should be as I am sure it could be used on another job.
Sincerely  Linda Holmes

name: Barbara Bonfield
text: Had a back splash added in my kitchen. Donna helped with selection of materials. The installation team arrived promptly and worked efficiently. They left a beautiful installiation and a totally clean kitchen. I was more than pleased with the result

resp.text: Barbara, we appreciate you sharing your experience with others who may be searching for design help for their kitchens too.  We are happy that you are pleased with the end results. 😀

name: john hillhouse
text: Great place to shop!  The selection and knowledge is the best in Birmingham.  Their installers are second to none!  Do not hesitate to call Brian's

resp.text: John, thanks for the shout out!  We appreciate your business and recommendations. 😀

name: Brad P
text: Brian's installed carpet at our new home. The people there were great to work with, from the initial consult to the showroom to the installers. We had a wonderful overall experience and I highly recommend Brian's!

resp.text: Thank you Brad for telling others about your experience.  We appreciate your business and recommendations.

name: Greg Hickey
text: GREAT PLACE.  The recent home improvement project was chaotic with not enough tiles from the year before to finish. Donna at the Southside store spoke with the contractor, matched the tile, and handled amount of grout, tile needed.Things went ahead on time and looks great!

resp.text: Greg, we are happy that everything turned out great!  We appreciate you sharing your Brian's experience with those searching online!

text: Great people with a great selection of tile. Brian's Flooring and Design re-tiled our fireplace and we were very happy with our experience. Our new fireplace is gorgeous!

name: Chris Cheatwood
text: Great customer service. Would highly recommend them for any flooring or carpeting work, whether it is new or an upgrade to what you already have.

name: m chaffin

text: Donna was very nice and helpful

resp.text: Thank you Chris for your nice compliment!

name: Dean Jones
text: Disappointed

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear you are disappointed, but don't think you have shared with others why.
We strive to offer each customer professional and great customer service.

name: Nick Kcin
text: No good, would not recommend. I was sold on the panel flooring we have being pulled up to repair the areas were gaps were located, this wasn't done. All the crew did was squirt glue into the gaps and jam them forward to join them. This resulted in not all the gaps being fixed, and the ones glued a few of them have mounds of dried glue sticking out.  The flooring that was placed was fine, but the 1/4 round wasn't painted/stained on the cut ends, the transitions were nailed in (which is fine) leaving  sharp nail heads sticking up which would easily cut a foot. I guess this job would have been ok if it was cheap but it was not.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear this. We know that our team went out and tried to fix your older flooring but put in new flooring that you loved. Please give us a call and we can help you out, thanks!

name: Beth Eddings
text: I cannot share enough good things about our experiences with Hill's. The quality of their work is wonderful and they stand behind it. We purchased some beautiful tile from them in 2016 transforming our kitchen and bath, and then in 2018 returned to purchase all new bedroom carpet before our daughter was born. Each time we've been presented with affordable options that are still of high quality and any time someone we know is looking for flooring I recommend Hill's in Hueytown. They offer all the same products as flooring places in Birmingham but at a fraction of the price due to being a small family shop.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your lovely review, Beth! Come see us anytime and we're so pleased you're happy!

name: Debbie Kleist
text: I highly recommend Hill's Carpet and Floor Coverings. The technicians arrived exactly when they told me they would, were experienced and efficient in their work and finished flooring my entire house in 2 days. They were neat and courteous as they worked. My floor looks beautiful and the price was reasonable. If you need flooring work in Hueytown, Hill's is the company to call.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mrs.Kleist! Come back and see us anytime!

name: Greg Marlin
text: I've been using Mr. Hill since the early '90's. Prices are always reasonable, products are great, & installs always go well. I would highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Diane C
text: I had a terrible experience and would not recommend or use them again. A 1 day installation turned into 5 visits to my home, they have not corrected everything they messed up, and they destroyed all the door frames. They tell you they've have been in business for a long time, but the owners are not the same, and neither is the quality of work.

resp.text: We have been patient in our reply and have decided it is time to respond since you will not take our repeated calls. We understand your frustration with the initial installation of your flooring which resulted in our decision to terminate the original contractor. Obviously we were frustrated as well and we spoke with you at length over the phone about this. The errors he made have been corrected.  You called again with concern that the carpet was not fastened correctly in one area and, though after inspecting we determined there wasn't a problem, we still agreed to have a contractor come and re-stretch it in an effort to resolve your concern.  We disagree that "they destroyed all the door frames".  Yes, there was some slight damage done to some of the door frames but they were far from being "destroyed".  Your salesman offered to repaint those areas himself but you declined.  We have gone as far as discounting your invoice three times in an effort to appease you.  We have a two year labor warranty and we stand behind it.  The quality of work performed by subsequent contractors to correct the errors of the first was excellent.  Hill's Carpet & Floor Coverings has been in business at our main location since 1986.  The original owner sold the business to his nephew some 9 years ago and the original owner remains active in the business.  We are proud of our history of serving the greater Birmingham area by offering quality products, competitive prices, and professional installation.  We're proud of and humbled by so many positive reviews on line.  We recognize that the original installation fell short of the last standard and we have tried diligently to work with you to resolve your remaining issue.

name: Kelly Finnegan
text: We chose to go with Hill’s over a box store like Home Depot or Lowes and we are so glad we did. They were so incredibly helpful throughout the whole process. They let us take home several samples until we found the right one. They explained the different types of carpets and the benefits of each one. Mr Hill personally came out and measured and quoted the room. Installers were right on time and worked quickly and did such a wonderful job. We love our carpet and plan to use Hill’s in the future when we redo our kitchen flooring.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for your honest review! We really do take pride in doing our best to bring beauty to your home without the hassle. Remember us and come back to see us anytime! Thanks again!!

name: Maria Holmes
text:
FYI LONG REVIEW: I originally contacted Hill's back in Aug to refinish our hardwood floors. Very pleasant experience with Clark with setting up my consultation. Cullen came out and did the consultation with me and my husband. It went well, and the price was very reasonable. He advised me that he would email me the proposal and to call him when we were ready.

I waited for the email but never received it. However, I still called a week later and let him know we were ready to schedule but that I still haven't received the proposal email. I didn't feel comfortable calling to pay my deposit over the phone without a proposal. He wasn't at the office when I called but was going to call once he got settled. When he finally called, I wasn't available but I still didn't get a proposal email.

So I waited before calling back. Then Clark called and left a msg asking if my consultation went well and if I was ready to schedule. At that time I was not because I wanted the proposal on paper with the amount I was quoted. Never heard back.

So I called again Monday, 10/12 and spoke with a gentleman about scheduling (yes I was still willing to use this company because the price I was quoted was the best). He got my name and address and tried to look up an invoice or proposal and guess what, there was none!! He asked who did my consultation and I told him Cullen. He said he would get him to call me. Days later, I'm still waiting on my call.

The other 2 companies I've contacted this week have been very responsive and gotten me proposals within the same day of the consultation. I'd rather pay the extra $ for great customer service and communication.

resp.text: Ms. Holmes, your experience with our company is very regrettable.  We strive to establish a meaningful relationship with all our customers resulting in a satisfying experience throughout the purchasing process.  It is unfortunate that in your case we failed to do that and we apologize.  Having been in business in the greater Birmingham area since 1987 we're very humbled and gratified by the excellent rankings we have on social media on Facebook, Google, and the Better Business Bureau.  We appreciate your candidness and again, apologize for not exceeding your expectations.  Your review is a reminder of the importance of delivering a satisfying experience for each and every potential customer every day.

I am pretty particular about everything, and Cullen (sales) was very patient with my indecisiveness and worked with me on figuring out what would make me happy. The install crew was prompt, super efficient, and extremely professional.  They exceeded my expectations, especially with cleaning up, and returning things to their original place. If you want good old fashioned customer service then you should definitely check them out!

name: frank sebert
text:
Please do yourself and choose wisely before using Hill's, I used the Helena store and can not and would not use or recommend any Hill's seeing how they all the same owner and installers.
I will tell you about my experience, The carpet is nice and seems to be installed well, this is not where the problem is and if you enjoy paying someone to rub paint off your walls and base boards then tell you" well that just happens" then you have found your place. My wife and I spent over an hour sweeping dusting and vacuuming after the installers left angry and in a hurry, when i told them I expected them to vacuum and clean what mess they made during the install, just got in the van and left?!
I will tell you the salesman did at least get me a whole pint of paint so I could repaint what HILL'S CARPET should have taken care of, there wasn't even an offer to say "hey how bout we at least knock of $20.00 or $25.00 for your time and trouble." Granted by what it would have taken to make this right it isn't a major deal, but do you really want to spend your hard earned money and have to clean up and paint a house you just cleaned and painted? Then be disrespected and talked down to in your own home? Please make a better choice than I did. There are many carpet stores in the area and I know most will appreciate your business,
I can tell you for a fact unforunately that HILL'S CARPET will not.

resp.text: We're sorry for the bad service at the time but you may call us at our office anytime. Also thank you for rating honestly. We've recently expanded our showroom in Helena to display a lot more product lines which greatly expands choices and our crews are amazing! Come back and give us another chance to wow you! Thanks!

Called them back and they refused to come and replace the carpet as requested to be done in the first place. They sent out the owner named TERRY who only came to BULLY me by RECORDING in my home. She was very mean and aggressive. DONT USE THIS COMPANY. WORST CARPET AND FLOORING I HAVE EVER SEEN. THEY WILL DESTROY YOUR HOME AND THEN WASH THEIR HANDS. text: D & J is one of the few remaining companies that stand behind their work and are true craftsman! They do beautiful work and are good people! D & J has an excellent reputation and there is a reason why!!!

text: D&J is one of the best in the business. Been doing it for 50 yrs and the quality/customer service shows. They did my hardwoods and I’m very please. I walk around the house starring at them. Thanks D&J

name: Heath Hood
text: D&J resurfaced our existing hardwoods and installed new in the kitchen. The floors were rough and full of swirl marks and had a bug under the clear coat to begin with. They came back out to fix and simply screened the clear coat and put another coat on which didn't solve any of the problems. After that they quit responding and never would fix the issues. 1 year later the surfaces are starting to peal and bubble up around the hardwood seams. Overall a poor job and even worse customer service. The original owner seems honest but it's ran by his son in law now whom has a very poor attitude to match his poor craftsmanship.

Other than the hassle of getting into and out of there, everything is great about the place.

text: A master bathroom renovation seemed more than daunting until we reached out to Ray Boles at Prattville Carpet.  His design expertise proved invaluable. The process was stress free and fast thanks to Ray and Prattville Carpet.

text: Ronnie and David have been fantastic in helping me pick out my floors and shower tile.  I highly recommend Prattville Carpet

name: Chris Jarrett
text: Barry and his team of installers where amazing. From start to finish great job. Barry came to my house after I got off work (well after 6) to show me the samples. Lots of option with zero pressure. They installed quickly and with very little interruption in our lives. On the day of the install I got home from work and thought they hadn't come that's how well they cleaned up. It wasn't even apparent they had been there until I walked in and saw my amazing floors. Zero interest payments for 12 months was a nice bonus.

text: Prattville Carpet put new tile in our house and did a fantastic job!  From helping us select our tile to the installation,  everyone was great.  They even moved all the furniture!

text: I have had multiple experiences with Prattville Carpet and the Boles family.  They have always been honest and reasonable to deal with.  In an industry such as Floor Covering, it is refreshing to find a business owned and operated by people you can trust to do what they say they will do.  It makes all the difference.

text: Really excellent value and fast! They delivered and installed everything on time and worked around the schedule with our painting crew. Really great owner, who cares about the work quality. There were a few things we had to add in, last minute and a few things that needed to be changed once the work was completed and he worked with us to make it right. This is a family owned business and we love to support that as well.
