text: We have done business here before and once again the employees were OUTSTANDING!  They even took us in the back to show us their kitchen flooring so we could have a better feel for what it would look like   Another place you have got to at least check out if you're in the market for flooring.  But they have other items also like tile for backsplashes.

name: Jordan Smith
text: Blake was amazing! I wasn’t having much luck getting ANY responses (email, phone, etc) from other local flooring stores but Blake kept in touch and worked with us on getting us the BEST price and made the process SO easy!!!!! Will recommend to everyone I know, & be using them for all future needs!

name: Tracy Sedlack
text: Needed a quick install to sell a house. Customer service was outstanding. Jim worked with me and helped find me a great deal on new flooring. Installed two days later and looks great. Can't thank Jim and the installers enough for the great service and help picking a great looking carpet for the whole house.

name: Ashley Carson
text: Most definitely a one stop shop!!! I am so very happy we chose American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to take care of all our needs in building our new home. My husband an I finally built our dream house this year;  we were treated like family from all the staff and installers from start to finish.  We did LVP flooring throughout it is absolutely gorgeous. They helped us pick out the perfect tile and accent pieces for our walk-in shower. The solid wood cabinets were just fantastic they went perfect with the quartzite we chose for the kitchen an master bath, it makes my heart beat fast, it's so beautiful. They have a large selection from all over he world, slabs I have never seen before anywhere.                                        I want to thank everyone there for making our experience a little less painful, anytime you build a house things come up and we were very pleased how they worked with us on our scheduling.  I highly recommend American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to all my family and friends. We are so very happy!!!!

name: Melanie Lobel
text: First visit to American Carpet and had the best experience picking out carpet. Johnny Marino was such a professional and assisted me with making great selections at a terrific price. They were able to meet my installation requirements immediately. The quality and service was so remarkable that I went back 2 days later and purchased gorgeous marble for my fireplace surround. What a pleasure doing business with American Carpet and Flooring. Definitely ask for Johnny. Great guy.

name: Tazman Reid.
text:
The sales lady was fantastic, she pretty much took care of everything over the phone, I went to the store and was out of there in 10 min.
A 10 for Marisa !

name: Gerald Drakeford
text:
Mr. Don Williams always has a warm smile and greeting each time we visit the store. Johnny facilitated our flooring and granite orders and was great to work with as well!

We had hardwood floors as well as granite countertops installed.  Glynn and his crew did a great job on the flooring. They were on time each day and were very attentive to details during the installation.

Likewise, the guys that installed our granite countertops were top shelf as well, detail oriented, and very professional.

Would definitely recommend American Carpets and Flooring!

name: Kishina Brown
text: I was looking for purchasing new flooring for the rest of my house. I walked in with a large piece of carpet in hand to see what would look good with my new carpet. As I entered I was not greeted. I noticed three men in a corner talking and I walked close by and again never greeted. So I will not ever step foot in this store again.

name: James Sessions
text: My wife and I decided to totally remodel our master bathroom which was a big deal for us.  After making visits to several stores and getting conflicting advice on what we could and should not do. We were so confused but knew how we wanted the new bathroom to look.   I suggested that we stop by American Flooring which we decided to be the last stop before leaving Mobile and head to Baldwin County or even Pensacola. American Flooring should have been our first stop.  We met Johnny Marino and shared with him what we wanted to see in our new and updated bathroom project.  He took our the contractor's proposal along with many pictures that my wife had gotten off the internet, how we wanted our new bathroom to look.  He provided us with expert advice.  He took the time to tell us what we needed.  He was more than a salesman... I considered him an expert in flooring.  We are so excited, we cannot wait until the job is completed.

name: Burchfield lc
text: Great service from picking out flooring to the install! Highly recommend! They are a locally owned company with fantastic prices, I will be back next time!

name: Sandra Mikul
text: Beautiful installation! Michael and Cliff were pleasant, efficient and we love the final product.  Glad we decided on new counters! Also, Robert gave us good advice on choosing colors while we were looking at the large inventory.  Thanks

name: Daniel Garrido
text: Amazing store to buy from, great people and service. Definitely recommend!

name: Ashley La Bounty
text: Our experiences has been amazing!!! The quality flooring and staff is amazing. Had the pleasure of working with the owner himself and he make us feel right at home every time.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: I only deliver packages to them but every time I go they always helping someone with a great attitude.

name: Stanley Self
text: Great. Carpet and pad.  Wonderful flooring.   Installers were very friendly and respectful.  Salesman was very friendly and helpful.  Very satisfied.

name: Theresa Seibert
text: American Flooring and Granite has impeccable customer service very knowledgeable on all the products.  I love the fact that they use a 15 year sealer on all the natural stones. They have a large selection to choose from. My counter tops are beautiful!

name: Richard Moore
text:
NEVER AGAIN!
This level of incompetence is unfathomable. My installer calls me up to verify directions, ten minutes later one of the employees calls me to tell me "We can't sell you this flooring" ( That the salesman practically begged us to pay for weeks earlier) Half my house is on my porch and in my yard at this point. They had their third "problem" reported two days earlier but didn't bother to call the people who had bought any of it. The sales man was an absolute joke. I don't know whos brother-in-law he is but that is the ONLY way he could keep his job!
The Installers....were AWESOME! (Sub contracted).
This is only part of the issues I had....all I can say is,
American Flooring will NEVER get another dime from me.

name: Jesse Brewer
text: We did a major  2 1/2 bathroom remodel at our home and American Flooring Cabinets & Granite did a great job! It was a pleasure working with  Jennifer who helped us pick out our porcelain tile and exotic granite.  It did not stop there she took the time to pick out the paint color that would compliment the exotic granite and porcelain tile.  The  selection of porcelain tile and granite options we viewed that day at American Flooring Cabinets & Granite was  top quality.  The workers did a top notch job.  At the completion of the job, Jennifer came out and looked over everything and made sure we were satisfied with everything.  All of our questions were answered.  Our future flooring projects will definitely be handled through American Flooring.

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse! Glad we could serve you!

name: Donna Dicken
text: My husband and I are very please with the whole experience from buying our flooring to the two gentleman who put it in. They did a fantastic job. We LOVE our new floor. We recommend American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite and will use again in the future.

name: Steven Duquette
text: I had a great experience at AFC&G from the minute I walked through the door until the minute the job was completed.  Don and Jennifer were so helpful throughout the entire process and what a selection of materials they have in the storeroom to choose from.  My granite counter tops and custom designed shower turned out like a showroom display.  Many thanks to Roland who did the design and installation.  Every measurement and cut he made was with laser precision.  I highly recommend you visit the showroom to see what they carry and talk with their very knowledgeable sales reps.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Duquette! We loved the finished product and are glad to have you as a loyal customer! If you need anything at all, you know who to call.

name: jay trammell
text: Stay away from this place. Salesman that helped me was great. Owner is crazy to work with I was giving quote and come in to store and he changed it. Very low to do. Obviously does not care about business . This 5k plus Job was going to be a 12k plus job when done so business is not his priority. Other stores did honor their quotes.  Check your options as they lost me and a lot more business because of this guy. Pathetic customer relations .

name: Forest Dixon`
text: American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite is the best place to go if you're interested in perusing some remodeling a home. We just had some new carpet installed in our house and couldn't be more pleased with the outcome! Mr. Don Williams is personable, yet professional. He gave us a fair up-front price as soon as we gave him our measurements. Ms. Jessica also helped us and she was a pleasure to work with as well. Even the installers were professional, quick and did a wonderful job. We are planning on remodeling our bathrooms with new cabinets, granite counter-tops and porcelain tile, so we know exactly where to go for our next project!

resp.text: Thank you, Forest! We appreciate your business!

name: Maggie Ainsworth
text: American Carpet did an AMAZING job on my new vinyl flooring!!! Workers were professional, punctual, and friendly. I would highly recommend them to anyone interested in new floors. Will definitely use them again!!!!

name: Mike Doggett
text: Great Selection!! This store has a TON of products. Jennifer was our salesperson and guided us every step of the way. We looked at engineered wood and solid wood flooring, but ended up getting a beautiful tile that looks exactly like a wood floor. Guests are shocked when they find out it's tile. We also got a backsplash and granite for our bar and it looks amazing. We will be going back when we get ready for cabinets.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking upgrade their home. They had a amazing selection of vinyl plank and vinyl tile that would be perfect for a bigger family on a budget.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike! Great doing business with you!

name: HM M
text: I walked in and was not greeted. I walked up to two people at desks and they didn't seem interested and couldn't seem to help even though I had a tile in my hand. They called another guy. I asked him about finding a similar size to my vintage tile because Lowe's only had 4x4. He said it would have to be measured and hesitated. He said he would see if he could find a tape measure. He came back and measured and said 4.25x4.25 and that was custom. He said I would have to buy a box but wasn't positive he knew how many tiles that was. He did a bunch of stuff on a calculator until he quoted me 100 tiles for $62. I needed 14 so I told him I would check back after searching. He told me he had the same problem when he did his bathroom. He said okay and maybe I would find an open box somewhere. I walked into Home Depot and 4.25x4.25 is a standard size. I bought 14 tiles for $2.46. I'm not sure what to say about that. I will let you come up with your own conclusions.

name: Lynn Sigouin
text:
Thank you once again for another beautiful and professional installation. Our stairs look like the center piece of our new home thanks to our wonderful Irene who gave us great customer service and always followed up with calls, Jonathon and Stephen who installed with perfection for detail and so,so polite and so talented.
And for the kind, sweet voice on the other end greeting me this morning,  Jessica who assisted all my needs.
Great team you have, Don...Jay, I am sorry to have missed you my friend but we couldn't be more pleased .
Blessings to all,
Thank you again,
Ray and Lynn Sigouin (Principe)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lynn!! We are so thankful for your business. Please let us know if you need anything else in the future!

name: Belinda Hall
text: I came to this store for cabinets.  It is going on 2 months. The are not hung. The parts of the cabinets they just ordered without ever coming to my home for any type of measurements are under my carport blocking so I can't park my car. I have called repeatedly,  people have been rude, hung up on, talked down, and still no progress!!

name: Nina Propst
text: We are very satisfied with our new carpet and with the service we received.  We recommend checking them out for all of your flooring and countertops first...it will save you lots of time and stress!  Special thanks to Don Williams.  We will be back.

name: Mendy Nilsson
text: Shannon Williams is fantastic. He listened to my needs and showed me lots of options giving the pros and cons of each type of floor. That allowed me to choose the best floor for my needs and WOW I'm so thrilled with my luxury vinyl plank flooring. So beautiful and so easy to clean it makes cleaning house fun. Thank you Shannon and American!!

name: LeBarbara Stinson
text: I had the opportunity to have my Luxury Vinyl Plank floors installed by Mr. Glenn Smith. He had his team members with him. They were the kindest men. They worked hard and didn't half step on anything! They are funny and welcoming. I would recommend them anytime. I thoroughly enjoyed them. They were professional and operated on total and complete excellence!

resp.text: Thank you, LeBarbara!! We will let Glenn know he did a great job. We appreciate your business!

name: Susan Allen
text:
Very informative, professional, and helpful!

Thanks Don Williams.

name: Lisa McGhee
text: I want to say that I won a contest with American Carpets. My prize was 250$ off any area rug in the show room. I went in yesterday to pick out my rug, and was greeted by the owner Mr. Don.. I never expected to have the experience I had with the owner and or any of the showroom employee's they were all so nice and helpful. The owner was there to help me the whole time and made it very memorable he is a very great guy.. I would never hesitate about sending someone in to get any flooring these people treated me with the up most respect and dignity as if I was a paying customer and I'll never forget that... Thanks again to all the people at American Carpets.. y'all are the best... Thanks again Mr. Don glad to have met you...

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! It was our pleasure!

name: Mr. Curtis
text:
In the past I've remodeled homes for a living, but was never in the position to actually come out of pocket and select carpets, etc.
It turns out making the right choice is lots harder than you think! With the fierce competition now days, it's easy to be told what you want to hear, given prices that you can't judge properly, and ultimately, run around in circles ending with products that are NOT to your satisfaction.
These issues do not arise with American Flooring (the Mobile location is the one I've become acquainted with). The woman who answered my calls, Jessica, was absolutely wonderful to speak with, and the sales person she brought me to the table with, Shane, was both professional, and compassionate.
Suffice it to say I will be returning very soon!

resp.text: Thanks you, Mr. Curtis!! We look forward to hearing from you soon, and in the meantime if you have any questions at all, you know who to call!

name: t h
text: I have recently completed a kitchen renovation and love the outcome. Don helped me select the perfect quartzite countertop for the new island, we purchased luxury vinyl plank for the new floors plus found a beautiful new rug too. Thank you so much for all of your assistance! I am pleased and feel I got a great deal and great service at American Flooring. I would highly recommend them to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you!! We loved the way your kitchen turned out. Looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: candes ritter
text: I’ve had several rooms carpeted and have always received excellent service, prices and installments.  Absolutely...... this is your first stop if you need flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, Candes! We really appreciate your business!

name: Gary Stiegler
text: My wife came in with a sample and the info for the flooring which had been purchased at AC.  Johnny,  the salesman immediately let her know without looking around that they didn't carry the item.  She proceeded to look around the store on her own, no one asking if she needed help, but after 20 minutes, found the exact piece of flooring!  Found Johnny, and he gave her a price of almost $200 for a 12 piece box of vinyl flooring.  Thanks, but NO THANKS American Carpets!

name: Sally Faucheaux
text: Thank you Jennifer ..... She  was my floor and cabinet specialist..... And thank you for all your expertise,   Also want to thank every one else at  American flooring this is not  the. first time that they have done work for me.  I was very pleased in the past,   It has been some years ago I am changing now because I don't want carpet anymore I want to change to ceramic....great job then, and I am sure they will do a awesome job this time as well, after all   I came back for more ;)

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: Jennifer Vaughan is amazing to work with.   She saw my vision and brought it to life.  She also prepared me for the installation experience by explaining it honestly and in depth.   I will never use anyone else in the future except her.   American Flooring needs to hold on to her.

name: Sharon Thompson
text: I am a mortgage lender in the Mobile and Baldwin county areas and have referred more clients than I can count to the Mobile and Gulf Shores locations over the years. Whatever your home needs may be, American Flooring is well rounded with an amazing selection of products, and a wonderful team of sales reps and installers. Be sure you follow them on Facebook, they do lots of giveaways and sales you don't want to miss! If you want to call before you go in and actually schedule ahead, ask for Jessica and she'll make sure someone is there to greet you and meet whatever needs you have!

name: Jessica Bates
text: I'm only giving one star because the material itself was great. The guy that did our template for our countertops measured wrong and only half of my notch was able to be done. The installers flooded my bathroom because the water wasn't off when they took the pipes apart. They knocked several holes in my walls and left without mentioning any of them. After a SIX HOUR install, I still had no water to my sinks and only half of the kitchen done. My stuff wet and laying everywhere and holes in walls in every room they worked in.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the situation. We are reaching out to the installation crew and will make this right for you, whatever it may take. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Update: Thank you for allowing us to fix all of the issues. We appreciate your business!!

name: Leslile Reddick
text: I used American Carpets to install my granite, carpet and laminate flooring in my kitchen.  This was done in August 2013.  My carpet separated between rooms and along the kitchen and living room and nails are sticking up.  My under counter sink is loose.  I have been trying to have this fixed for months now with no resolution at all.  Chris in installation has been out to my house twice to "look" at it with promises of it being fixed.  Nothing has been done.  I feel that the work that was done was unprofessional and cheap.  I spent a lot of money on this and would expect it to last longer than a year and if not, at least for it to be fixed in a timely manner.  I will never refer anybody to American Carpets as my experience has been very dissatisfying.  I have never written a review before, much less a negative one, but I felt I had to because I have been getting the run around for months.

name: Steve Baker
text: Very friendly folks. Not only did I get a great job on my ceramic flooring​, I think that this business has a lot of Christian people and that is why it is doing so good. Chris and his son that laid my flooring did a great job. Shane the salesman also knows his job. A plus to this business.

name: Lacy Hilliard
text: Craig Crawford and his crew did excellent on the installation of vinyl flooring. They were personable, well mannered and addressed my concerns immediately . This is the crew you need for your installation! Showroom time was quick and precise with my needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy! We've let Craig know how great of a job he did. We look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Kem Hall
text: I googled wood floorings and came up with this store. For years I thought they only sold carpet.  I found a vast amount of everything needed for a home; granite, cabinets, wood flooring, tile, rugs, vinyl plank, you name it and its here.  This is a ONE STOP SHOP. Employees are welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable to help with everything. They have good deals too.

name: Kyla Gaston
text: I GOT THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH JENNIFER V. AND JAN R.  - OH MY GOODNESS THEY ARE A TERRIFIC TEAM. I HAD AN ISSUE WITH MY FLOOR WHEN MY HOME WAS BUILT DUE TO THE WRONG DOOR BEING PLACED IN THE HOME, MY WOOD FLOORING HAD TO COME UP DUE TO WATER DAMAGE AND I HAD TO REPLACE IT WITH ANOTHER PRODUCT. JENNIFER AND JAN SAW HOW UPSET I WAS AND WAS ABLE TO MAKE FEEL BETTER AND REASSURED ME THE SECTION OF MY FLOOR WOULD LOOK FABULOUS. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THE TILE AND MOSIAC ACCENT TILE FOR THE FLOOR AREA, IT LOOKS LIKE THE HOME WAS ORGINALLY BUILT THAT WAY. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR JENNIFER AND JAN TWO WONDERFUL LADIES AND THEY ARE GREAT AT THEIR JOBS.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Kyla!!

name: Ethel Moore
text: My husband and I received a warm welcome upon entering the storefront and we were treated wonderfully! I explained to Shannon,  our sales rep,  what I wanted and he took us right to it!  It felt as if we were old friends.  I was never pressured to purchase anything which is a PLUS.  I cannot count the many times that I left a place due to the pressure to buy something that I'm really not looking for.  We also met the 'big man in charge' -as I affectionately refer to him.  You know,  the 'open 8 to 8 so don't be late' gentleman.  Lol.  Very warm and professional.  The carpet they installed looks AMAZING!  It's exactly what I wanted at the price I wanted! I will DEFINITELY recommend American Flooring and Cabinets. Ask for Shannon,  HE IS A GEM!

name: Lynn Zimmerman
text: We had Johnny also five years ago and are sorry we went there. We asked for the best pad that they had and also wanted quality carpet and were told that we had ordered it. Now we have "humps" in our carpet from stretching and we have to replace it soon. They tiled our foyer, hall and kitchen and while we love the tile they are uneven and chipped. Afterwards they fixed some but in order to make it right they would have had to redo most of it.  For $6,000+ we just expected better.  Make sure that you know what you are getting is right and the quality that you expect. We went to the Mobile store to have our work done.

name: AllDone3
text:
Not only did they sell me on buying material from them instead of the competitors in the are, they educated me on WHY was more durable or waterproof than another and explained the difference in the products that I was interested in.

"People buy from people, not companies."

These people took fantastic care of me and my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Aldon! We look forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Katie Azevedo
text: We love our new carpet! The prices were reasonable and everything was done quickly and professionally.

name: Mallory Howard
text: So, my impression was great when I left the store but quickly changed. Salesmen were very helpful. Acted eager to help us get our remodel done. They showed me a countertop that they had in stock. It was ok, but not exactly when I was looking for but they insisted it looked great. I again, said no, I’ll keep looking. Kept looking and found the one, the countertop that would look the best. Left the store with the salesman’s card to call back with measurements. My husband called them 2 hours later to get a quote. Salesman tried selling him the countertop they had in stock but was not what I looking for. My husband told him no, she wants the other. He quoted him a price. Then called back and DOUBLED the the first quote because they’d have to order it. Seems they were eager to help sell what they had in stock, but be darned to sell what they’d have to order. We won’t be making a purchase from this store. Our business will go else where.

name: Scotti Bee
text: Great place. Everyone I worked with was fantastic. Great attitudes, wonderful customer service.

name: Apple Henderson
text: Well..well well, what can I say??  I sought help and met a man named Johnny at American.  We were needing granite and flooring.  He showed us a couple of choices and suggested we go to the warehouse in Loxley to pick granite and took our info and said  let him know what we decide on and we'll get a quote.  Needless to say he lost our info and forgot who we were.  We contacted him and reminded him of the quote.  He was to get with us on several occasions and did not!!  The lady who answered my call was aware of my frustration and got a owner/manager to take my call.  Got another we'll get you the answer and call you spill again.  We are not from here and should have believed reviews...SOOOO grateful to have been referred to HARD ROCK GRANITE....they are professional, personable,  thorough, quick and they treat you like family. If quality everything choose HARD ROCK they will be honest and get you a better deal too!!!!!

resp.text:
April,

I am so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience. We really appreciate your feedback, and hope that in the future you give us the chance to make it right.

name: Logan Crouch
text:
I came in with a friend and Johnny Marino was our salesmen. I have never had a worse experience. He was introduced to us as 'the man who knew it best' and that he had 'been in the business for 43 years'. However, he was not polite, seemed to talk over us as we explained our needs, treated us as if we had no idea what we wanted, and overall was completely unprofessional: not only to us, but for other customers who were in the store. We were shown one product, and after the purchase, were shown a completely different colored product; then were argued to repeatedly that it was the light causing the color difference.

The business had a wide selection of products, and I'm sure with another salesman we would have had a better experience. But this particular transaction just left a bad taste in my mouth.

name: Joshua Carper
text: Dont shop here they are crooks!

name: Victoria Wilson
text: Advertised "Open 8 to 8". Arrived about 5:40 unaware of new store hours. Came to buy flooring for 3 rooms. Salesman took me to the back to look at sheet vinyl rolls and remnants. Told me to browse while he figured out how much I needed from the measurements that I provided. I thought he was taking a little too long. Went to look for him and discovered that everyone had left and locked the doors. That's when I saw a sheet of white paper on the front door with new store hours 8-6. I HAD A PANIC ATTACK! Called my sister. She called Mobile Police Dept. MPD came. A woman in another vehicle then arrived and told him how to get me out. I left a note on the salesman's desk with my name and phone number and what had happened. I picked up my floor plan and measurements and left. NO ONE EVEN CALLED TO APOLOGIZE.

name: Michael A
text: Service was excellent. Shane Gros was very helpful. Definitely the place to shop. Can't go wrong. Thank you Shane for all your help!

name: Todd Burley
text: Visited this place on April 2nd to shop for new carpeting for our new house in Semmes. After we shopped around at several stores we found this place the most useful because of their helpful staff, affordable prices and financing. We ended up buying 1500 sq ft of carpet and had it installed last week, my wife loves the carpet and I love being able to get out of bed barefoot. We are very happy with American Flooring and would recommend them to anyone who needs a good deal on carpet

name: Cyndi Booth
text: I love, love, love my new kitchen granite countertops. They look great with the new cabinets recently installed by American Flooring, Cabinets , and Granite . I had the tile floors installed in a few rooms about 6 months ago. Everything is coming together and looking beautiful! Next is the bathroom shower and countertops and a bedroom needs hardwood flooring and........American Flooring, Cabinets, & Granite "Your One Stop Shop" for all of your remodeling needs!

name: John rohman
text: They have a beautiful showroom and staff was very helpful it was a great experience no stress,ill be back

resp.text: Thanks, John! We are looking forward to it!

name: Danny Woodard
text: Attended the event they had last week where they said they were giving away prizes. I was told by a young lady there the drawings wouldn't be until late that evening and that I had to buy something to get a ticket. I then decided to buy a bottle of cleaner and was told that wasn't enough value for a ticket into the drawing. Clearly a bait and switch tactic to get people in their expensive store. Buyers Beware!

resp.text: No purchase was necessary to enter the contest or win. In fact, 4 out of 5 of our big prize winners didn't shop with us that day. We did not find this customer in our database of transactions that day. We appreciate all of our customers who came in for our 45th anniversary customer appreciation day event and hope to continue being your one stop shop!

name: Diane james
text: LOVE my new rugs! Will definitely be doing business with y'all in the future!

resp.text: Looking forward to it! Thanks!

name: Norma Beachman
text:
We got everything we asked for .the company is number 5 you
And their employment Ronald STEGMEIER is So Good At his Job
iWould Give Him A 10
He made Sure the Job was done Right And worked untill it was Finished
On A Saturday we would Recommend your Company and  Employee
Ronald STEGMEIER to anyone.
Robert and Norma BEACHMAN

resp.text: Thank you, Norma!! We appreciate your business and I believe you meant Roland? We will let Roland know of his stellar job!

name: val hansen
text: When you place an order for 14 boxes for laminate flooring and get 3 boxes you think maybe it was just 1 mistake.  When you also place an order for ceramic tile for the facing of your fireplace at the same time you ordered the laminate flooring and you get 3/4 of it you start to wonder about this store that's been in business for so long. When you place an order for 3 boxes of ceramic tile for the inside of your fireplace at that very same time and you get 1 box because they FORGOT to order 3 and  you have PAID for it ALL!!!!  I am wondering WTH is THEIR problem!!!!  I took back the 1 box of ceramic tile since I didn't like it,  it didn't match, got a refund, pkd up the 3 boxes of flooring and tried to give me the other 2 boxes of ceramic tile I had gotten a refund on?????  Yes, I know had for me to believe too!!  Finally got all of my flooring. Had to reorder more fireplace facing tiles, pd for it, was told it was ordered as I was in the store and would be in that Friday, it came in the next Tuesday!!!! Found out it was NOT ordered until the day AFTER I ordered it!!!!  BTW, I finally went to LOWES, and got the rest of the ceramic tile I needed for the inside of my fireplace that they had IN STOCK!!  All this going on as my contractor was doing what he could with what we had!!!  Needless to say HE was not very happy and will be writing a review also on this store.  I live 18 miles 1 way from this Mobile store.  I made a trip 6 days in a row.  My sales person was Shane Williams.  I would NEVER recommend this store to anyone and will tell everyone I know of my experience.

name: J H
text: Misleading sales. If they make a mistake you are stuck with it...no returns! I tell everyone not to shop here. Salesman called me "sweetie" when he refused to correct his mistake..how demeaning. Similar incident with an acquaintance of mine, so must not be a rare occurrence.

name: Leigh Stewart
text: Don has always help us in anyway that he can.  If I ever had a problem,  Don take care of it himself. We have been with him for many, many years.

name: Hannah Saenz
text: This is most definitely a one stop shop, bought my counter tops, cabinets and flooring here. The prices were very affordable and I highly recommend this place to everyone!

name: Jonathan Cunningham
text: Good place friendly service

name: Jason Pyon
text: Great people, great floors!

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

name: jessie james
text: Awesome Customer Service!!!!!!

name: Tiffany Middleton
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffany. We appreciate your business!

name: Kyle Patterson
text: Very good experience

resp.text: Thanks, Kyle! Who was your sales rep?

name: Michael Farrier
text: Helpful

resp.text: Thank you, Michael!

name: Joshua Southard
text: They are very nice and extremely helpful to the extent of looking at pictures of the wall color and getting a good match for the floor and not clash. They have everything you need to get a floor done with real hardwood, laminate hardwood, vinyl and tile carpets and rugs. If u can walk on it THEY will have it. I'm still waiting on the free home estimate and I will update this post after with pictures.

name: Traci Reed
text: What a wonderful experience today at this establishment working with Kim! It was so refreshing to work with her and Dinah!! And we got Everything we wanted and needed. We love All we picked out!! Can’t wait to see it all in our New Forever Home!!!!

name: Mike Measels
text: Shane and David did great. They were committed to and take great pride in their job. They were punctual every day and if they were going to be a little late would notify us. They have the process of refinishing floors down to a science and a lot of hard work.  They were also courteous and friendly.  We highly recommend them.

name: Merri Bass
text: Staff is the best!! Helpful and very knowledgeable about all things flooring.

name: Steven Stovall
text: Very nice and willing to answer all your questions Good people

name: Jacques Cockrell
text: Great experience. Very professional and knowledgeable. Nice selections and great attitudes.

name: Balinda Adams
text: This place has just the right amount of a variety of flooring without making you overwhelmed. The young guy at the desk was very nice and attentive to us when we came in. Shane went out of his way to make sure my parents found everything they were looking for. He even gave them a sample of wood to take home to see if it matched the staircase. He also gave them a quote that was much cheaper than the other flooring store we had went to. He was honest and very upfront. If you go by, ask for Shane and he will take great care of you and even help with design questions.

name: Adam Baker
text: We were pleasantly surprised when we walked in the door! Not only did everyone greet us but several were busy with other customers yet they made sure we were taken care of. We told Vicki what we wanted and she read my mind and presented several options. We will not only mention them to our friends we will shop with them again very soon. Thank you for your hospitality and commitment to making sure we got what we wanted, in the budget we had to work with and all installed in a timely manner.

name: T W
text: Update to a review with only 1 star rating several months ago from De W. As the customer who wrote it, we made an effort to update the rating but could not seem to do so. However, please know that all concerns with the installer were addressed and done so professionally. In reality the concern was simply a breakdown in communication. No one is perfect and they did what was right and corrected our concerns. Ryan was excellent and prides himself on taking care of the customer. Please omit the rating from your decision process on where to buy your flooring. They truly deserve a full 5 star rating.

name: Vicky Brown
text:
Very Helpful and Knowledgeable Staff.
Great Selection to choose from... well
laid out showroom.  I would Recommend
to others.

name: Judy Croft
text: Our overall experience was outstanding, from the selection to the service. Thank you for your design advice, it really helped us make the right selection for our project. I would recommend to everyone. Thank you.

name: De W.
text:
They promise you ethical treatment, integrity & flawless service. Don't believe it.
Once carpet was selected - salesman assured quality professional installers in a timely manner.
The installer arrived late; talking highly of himself and did not reply or respond when asked questions. Once carpet installed, we inspected job. Carpet had high strips where Sean's were like the carpet was doubled at the seam. I pointed it out to installer (Terry), and he pulled on it saying it won't come loose. I said I wasn't worried about it coming loose but the seam was obviously thick.
He ignored my concern. A week later I called back and spoke to sales person who came our days later to look at it. It took another week to get a call back where salesman asked for a convenient time for installer to come back. I gave him 2-days and timetable around my work schedule. Salesman said he would call installer and get back with me on day & time. I was assured installer would be back to repair on one of the days I provided but he would call back to confirm.
On the day installer was suppose to be here for repair I received a call from installer saying he was calling to set up the appointment. What?! You were were suppose to be here....
I called the store and I got excuses from the lady sales person saying the installer was trying to call me.
Don't bother calling these people..they don't know what they're doing and they are not customer service conscious. I won't be using them again.

name: J Bin8148
text: Price I was quoted for materials changed drastically after work was done. I was told those were the in stock prices. Had no choice but to pay I was never contacted saying the quote was going to be different. Stay away

name: Catrina J
text:
No customer service. My husband and I visit the store this morning looking to purchase some flooring. When we entered, no one greeted us or said one word to us while we were there. We looked around and nothing. Waited near the desk, nothing. We left! If you are with a customer or busy, all it takes is 10 seconds to say "Hello! welcome! We will be with you shortly"
We spent our money elsewhere.

name: Lillian Black
text: Very happy with experience from sales to fantastic installers. Price exactly what estimate was.

name: Mark G.
text: We bought our flooring from Alabama Custom Flooring  and Design and couldn't ask for a better experience.  The service was beyond my expectations.  I highly recommend them for all you flooring needs.

name: Jared Toone
text: Great selection and pricing. Order came in quickly and all went well.

name: michael joseph
text: easy experience. helpful/knowledgeable sales person

name: Michelle Hockersmith
text: Thank you to Ryan for the excellent service.   I highly recommend Alabama Custom Flooring & Design for all your flooring needs.

name: Stan D
text: They quote cheap prices by the foot, and then over measure by nearly 20%...be careful with this place.

name: Dana Lee
text: Great place to find flooring.

name: Jeremy Gillilan
text: A must see if you are doing a room remodel or just a floor. They now even do granite countertops. Their showroom is absolutely the best in North Alabama. You get quality here and it will last a lifetime. Danny and Jennifer are the BEST!!!!! Great people and they do great work! You will not be disappointed and I highly recommend W&W for all your flooring and remodel needs.

name: Tommy/ Niki Mcleod
text: Appreciate the extra time they spent on my behalf and job well done

name: A Todd Baker
text: They have everything!

name: Landon K
text:
Get customer service, great prices, and easy to work with.
Took several SPC and carpet samples home to find exactly what we wanted, worked out a price we were happy with on the flooring, picked it up when were ready for it, and had it installed by a local contractor. We have had the flooring for almost a year now and are completely happy with the quality of flooring we purchased. I am also looking to use them again, but this time on a commercial project.

name: Taylor Martin
text: Friendly, knowledgeable and professional staff were very helpful from the moment I walked in the door. They have a great selection of flooring and very reasonably priced. I went with some cool looking LVT and can’t wait to get it installed. It was a pleasure doing business with you. Thanks again!

name: Mary Evans
text:
Mary is the best! They are so patient and helpful!
Great prices too!

name: david loeser
text:
I normally do not do reviews but this place does not practice good business. They are not for the customer but only want to make a sell. My wife had a list of exactly what was needed from the person who was installing the flooring in our house and she showed the list to the people who work there. They showed my wife flooring and she picked the color she likes. Not knowing the type of floor was wrong. Remember these are the “experts”. We unloaded all the floor at the house the next morning the person installing asked why they gave us the wrong stuff. We ended up having to return the floor which we would have purchased the right floor from them but they charged us a 20% restocking fee because they sold us the wrong floor. Knowing what was asked for and needed as my wife showed pictures of the subfloor.

Nonetheless they lost our business and stole 20% because they should have fit that bill due to their lack of of professionalism and customer service.

If you want the cheapest price maybe they are the place to go, who knows. But if you want customer service and want to be sure you are getting the best product for your needs this is definitely not the place to go.

resp.text: Yes they did give us a list of materials they needed. On that list were the items that they needed for a remodel and there was a quantity of flooring that they needed not a specific floor but just a quantity. We asked her what type of floor she was looking for so we helped her get a waterproof floor that she asked for. She had over 100 options to choose, yes we have a great variety at great low prices. Theirs was a 5mm/20mil wear layer at only $1.49 Sf by the way. She even took a sample of the entire piece. When they came to return the floor the installer came with her and he said that he seen the piece when they brought it to their home, he said that he seen the sample  when he was at the store. Why he did not mention he could not install that type of floor in that house we do not know (this was before the purchase was made). We gave her the floor she chose not a wrong one. She also read and signed a receipt that she still has that specifically says **no refunds** that’s why we let people take samples so they make sure they take the correct floor for their home. As many people here know that this is a family and USMC veteran owned and operated store and we treat people with respect. We have extensive knowledge about flooring and helped her get a floor that was waterproof that they did not want to install. We then proceed calling our supplier which does take returns at a 20% cost. Which they claim we stole but we have to give that to our supplier to return the floor just like any other store that charges restocking fees for special orders. We tried to help them and get their money even though we do not take returns and they accepted the 20% from the supplier. We never sold a wrong floor. The customer saw and took a sample and we gave her that exact floor that all the names and numbers match to the sample to the receipt and to all the boxes they took. We never sold a wrong floor. We’re just following store policies that she was well aware of when she signed and payed for her floor.

name: Scott D
text:
Botched the installation of my floors and left me out over $10,000 in repairs to fix the problem!

Summary: Old Gin Carpets installed wood flooring in the main living areas of our home. Within the first few months the floor visibly began to cup and buckle and remains that way today. 	The owner said he would, “make it right!” 	We have had to contact Old Gin Carpets over and over trying to get them to address this problem. However, well over a year after installation the problem with our floors remains. Our business with Old Gin Carpets has resulted in a loss of over $10,000 to repair the problem.

As part of a remodeling effort in our home, we had Old Gin Carpets install wood flooring in our main living area. After a few months we noticed a problem that I will refer to as ‘cupping’ on the new flooring. This effect was evident in all areas of the floor and worsened also resulting in ‘bowing’ in places where the floor raised high enough that it became a tripping hazard. I provided photos to Old Gin which was eventually followed by a visit from the owners, They told me that they had never seen anything like this and that they would do whatever needed to be done to, “make it right!” I had hoped that such a strong statement by the owner would surely lead to a resolution.

Unfortunately, months followed and it’s been well over a year now since the flooring was installed. During that time we have lived with the constant embarrassment and humiliation of having to explain to guests why our floors are messed-up and why in all this time it hasn’t been fixed. Old Gin has had multiple flooring inspectors look at the issue, but no exact cause has been mentioned. I have consulted with 2 licensed general contractors who have independently concluded that the lack of installation of a proper vapor barrier beneath the flooring is the most likely cause. It was also determined that there were no existing water leaks. I have also examined the National Wood Flooring Association and the flooring supplier’s own Installation Guidelines, Methods and Instructions that validates what I was told by these general contractors that more preparation should have been done prior to installation.

Old Gin was paid in full at the time of the installation. Our expectation of a North Alabama BBB A+ rated company would be one that would stand behind their products and service. It seems like it has been impossible to get resolution and it will end up costing us twice as much to repair as we will now have to remove the damaged floor and install a new one. This problem has taken far too much time and effort to address and many excuses have been given for the great delay in fixing the floor.
We feel that Old Gin has not been truthful in providing their products and services and that they have not met our expectations. Relative to the ideals listed by Old Gin Carpets on their website, we certainly have not been the focus of their business, we have not been happy with the product and we have received zero value for our money. In fact, we feel that they have flat-out taken us for our money!

text:
The service and product you receive from this location is top notch! They have so many choices and are very eager to help you in figuring out what and how much to order. Jeff is the rep I dealt with and he was excellent from beginning to end. I had found what we were looking for online so I showed it to Jeff and he gladly placed our order and it came in sooner than we expected .
The whole experience was so easy and we are so pleased with the final result. Their prices were great too and you can easily return any unused product.

text: Eric helped us with choosing a flooring for our hallway . He was very patient and listened to our wants/needs. This place has a great selection and great prices. Would reccomend 👍

name: Bob lee
text: Love my new wood t&g ceilings. Great service. Great prices. You guys Rock!

name: Rebecca Bemis
text:
Jeff and the guys who work with him are super knowledgeable and friendly.  The have mastered the art of helping DIY 'pro's' see potential installation problems they may be creating for themselves without making them fell stupid.  They ask all the right questions to make sure an appropriate product and the correct installation technique will be used.

In helping me find the right product for my project and budget, they patiently showed and explained various options to me.  Weeks later when I finally got fed up with not being able to make a decision I asked them for help on deciding the right color.  They considered the colors I was forced to work with and those I planed to use and helped me pick a beautiful floor.

Finally, they happily match sales prices when the price on a product is reduced after it is purchased  (30 day price guarantee I believe).

These guys will have my business for any future projects I create for myself.  They are more patient with me than I am!

name: Tasha Burgess
text: My parents got a quote to do their house but the price was high so they decided to wait a few months. A month later they got a bill from a bank saying they were late on their payment. HOW IS THAT EVE  POSSIBLE WHEN THEY NEVER HAD THE FLOORS INSTALLED?? This company, its people and their service is extremely SHADY. I WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY TO ANYONE.

text: Don's was awesome from start to finish when we had out floors done. Melinda was our salesperson and she was awesome. She worked with us to get what we needed in the price range we could afford. text: Don's Carpet is the best flooring business to work with!! Hi David,

Your satisfaction is important to us, and we want to ensure any concerns you have are properly addressed as promptly as possible. We were able to locate your account and have notified your handling representative, as well as our regional managers. We will be in contact with you shortly, and look forward to resolving this matter.

Lauren R. Customer Advocate.

text:
For over 18 years we have been using Issis and Sons for our flooring needs! We have done several different flooring jobs over the course of those years and All of the jobs have turned out outstanding! Joe Savoie is the best at helping us pick out the styles and colors for each job we have done and I would highly recommend him to help you with your flooring
endeavors! My wife and I cannot say enough Great things about Issis and Sons and their longevity in the flooring business says it All!

name: Barbara Lyle
text:
Would not recommend for window treatments, they did mine two times and still not right, my pleat has a seam where material was added and does not hang good. The drapery has a lot of puckering. Had estimates to remake and new ones will  be about 700.00  cheaper.
Will never use them again.

resp.text: Ms. Lyle, I want to start off by sincerely apologizing for your negative experience with our company. We strive to present top-notch customer service in all departments. It is reviews such as yours that provides our company the ability to learn from our mistakes in hopes of creating a better customer experience in the future. The process to create custom drapes is very tedious work. For most of our clients, we over deliver on our promise. I see from your file that we did go back 2 times at no charge to you to try to create the vision you desire, but from this post it appears you are still unsatisfied. I thank you and I hope you will grant us the opportunity to improve your image of us in the future.

text: Issis installed hardwoods and a little carpet area in our entire house. New construction. Really pleased. Floors are beautiful. We purchased two recliners and dining room chairs. I’ve worked with the Pelham store as well as the Vestavia store. Same great service.

name: Jd
text: We we looking for an area rug and had pretty specific requirements for quality, color and design, and price.  Issis has an enormous inventory covering a very broad range of price points -- that might have been a bit overwhelming save for the fact that Jim, the manager, and Steve, the owner, greeted us warmly and guided us (very patiently and expertly) to narrow down the selection to a manageable few.  We found exactly what we were looking for, and came away with a very competitive deal to boot. It was quite a trick to have the goods, to be willing and able to deal convivially with us while flipping and displaying dozens and dozens of rugs to be sure we saw all the possiblities, and to send us off --  both the picker and the payer -- as a happy couple :} - nicely done...

I’ve worked with the Pelham store as well as the Vestavia store. Same great service.

name: Dewayne Coleman
text: Robin was great she helped us find the exact furniture to order to match our existing

name: lisa worley
text: Tony is so knowledgeable about the tile business and he made the decision making process so much easier!  Great options and expertise... Thank you!

name: JC Love
text:
We recently bought two Bradington-Young sofas at the Issis and Sons location in Vestavia.  Jeff Price was the sales representative who assisted us.  He was very helpful in providing details concerning the construction, qualify and style of the sofas, including design options.  We had so many leather choices.  Jeff knew the pros and cons of each piece.  Since these are custom built sofas, the customer decides every facet of construction right down the the color and style of the decorative tacks.
When the sofas were delivered, the delivery men moved our old sofas to the basement (included service with delivery), which was a great help.  Before they brought in the new sofas, they covered our hardwood floors and stair railing to protect them.  Our foyer area has a large bookcase and stair rails, which narrows the walkway somewhat.  Even with those obstacles, they maneuvered the sofas through there without scratching anything.  I was impressed.
When they setup the sofas, they installed permanent protective cushioning on the feet to prevent future floor damage.  They operated all the power recliner features to ensure they functioned properly.  They were very courteous and professional.
I highly recommend Issis and Sons because they know their products and ask the right questions to ensure customers make informed decisions.  Keep up the great work.

name: Kelley LaBelle
text:
ISSIS & Sons did a fantastic job installing my new floor. The best pricing that I found and job was completed quickly.

Will use ISSIS & Sons again on my next project for sure.

name: Rosalind Donaldson
text: Great customer service  experience with Issis & Sons carpet in Pelham, Pelham Parkway location. Could not find an area rug for my living room. Stephanie worked with me, helped me narrow it down to two rugs. She arranged for the rugs to be delivered to my house.She came to my house and hallelujah the 2nd rug she put down looked fantastic. So appreciate all the work & trouble Stephanie went to assure that this customer was happy with the selection.

name: Kevin Weber
text: My wife and I had a wonderful experience. Great selection and prices. It is hard to find top quality furniture at affordable prices.

name: Patrick Bishop
text:
We have visited and shopped in Pelham for years, our experience with Issis and Sons began with the carpet store.  We purchased a number of rugs and have always appreciated the service from Jimmy and the entire Issis team.

We recently purchased a new home and where faced with hiring a decorator.  It was Issis and Sons that assisted us with colors in the house to have a pallet then the process of finding and ordering outstanding furniture.  We had a two to three week wait on most of it but everything came in as described.  Very high quality and delivered with care.

We have had a few issues with our dogs and the carpets and Issis team has always helped solve them.  These are great people and I would recommend Diane and her team at Pelham anytime.

name: Terry Bates
text: Awsome group of people. Management staff and installers went out of there way to ensure a positive experience!

name: rick cybulsky
text: Quality products with a large well lighted showroom.  Professional service.

text: Had to purchase some tile to extend an area that we tiled a couple of years ago. They were able to locate the same tile and get it for us in a timely manner.

text: Customer service is poor! Ordered commercial carpet for a facility with understanding that order would be rushed. After taking our money, no one contacted us about our order. Finally almost at the close of business on a Friday, we're told our order will not arrive as promised. I'm highly disappointed and do not recommend anyone use this business.

resp.text:
Ms. Cashmore,

Thank you very much for taking the time to notify us. Your input, and the feedback from all of our clients is vitally important to us and we always want to meet our clients expectations. If you would please contact me directly so that I can assist you in anyway. We sincerely apologize for your unpleasant experience.

Please contact me at your earliest convenience - Best Regards, Nancy Gowens 205-620-6926

name: Donnie Sapp

name: Terry Harlos

name: Issis & Sons Flooring and Furniture Gallery
text: Stunning showroom and selection.

name: Ashlyn Jones
text: Really wish I could give 0/5 stars because that's exactly what you will get working with Issis and Sons Flooring. During our previous home renovation, everything this company touched had to be fixed twice. Bathroom tile was laid un-level and a cracked piece was installed. Not to mention, the guy used so much self leveler it leaked through into our basement! A complete mess! 1500 SQ FT of LVP had to be removed and reinstalled due to no prep work involved and cracked pieces installed. Most quarter round was cracked and not even stained on the ends. Not to mention, they could not even provide ONE piece of missing quarter round that was requested for two weeks. POOR QUALITY AND CRAFTSMANSHIP. Stairs were stained twice and still had paint brush bristle hairs in the stain. Called it quits with these guys and will find someone to finish the job they already started. BEWARE...it's not worth your time or money.

name: daniel weber
text:
The guy I spoke with had a terrible attitude.
I called there today and asked them to send one of their estimators over to do measurements and give me a bid on replacing carpet.

After I told him that I would like to have the opportunity to introduce myself our company and products to them as well, he was very rude and said that he didn't need my business, then hung up the phone.
I believe in doing business with organizations that want to do business with you and keeping money local.
Apparently this gentleman has all the business he needs and doesn't care about local businesses.
DONT WASTE YOUR TIME HERE, WHEN THERE ARE MANY OTHER (LOCAL) FLOORING COMPANIES THAT WOULD LOVE TO WORK WITH YOU AND EARN YOUR BUSINESS.

name: mano de dios
text: The guys at the ware house work hard to help you out . Good service the only thing I don't like about it is they need to have more tools for tile installers.

text: After 3 months of getting the run around from two very non-professional flooring companies and walking over torn up wood, Issis and Sons stepped in to save the day! Not only were they quick to respond and sent a wonderful crew, they came when they said they would. We could not be more pleased with our beautiful flooring! We would recommend them above all others! Thank you Issis and Sons!

name: botcwc1
text: Put 4 inch hardwoods in our master suite and closet. Excellent job. When I was putting furniture back I accidentally scratch the floor and Jimmy immediately send somebody out to fix it at no charge. Top-notch service. Thanks again :-)

text: I can't say enough nice things about this company!  They have done work at my home and office, and always with great integrity and dedication to doing great work.  Great selection and pricing!

name: Sue Irwin
text: I bought 3 rugs from Issis for my new house to put on my refinished hardwood  floors,   The rugs are beautiful and Issis came and installed them.  I later learned that the pads they had put underneath them were cheap and could deteriorate .  My the time I found out and replaced them my new hardwood floors already had spots where the pad had stuck to the floor and left a sticky residue.  You would think after buying expensive rugs that Issis would put better pads under them or at least tell you that you needed to buy pads.  The fact that they put pad under them that could ruin my floors is appalling .

resp.text: Sue, our apology for the slow response. I took over for the role of communication manager recently and would like to know what we can do to make you happy. Please email me at issis.furniture1@gmail.com or contact your sales representative directly. Thank you

the salesman never returned my messages.  i took pictures to the billing manager-who agreed the work was substandard.

name: Jamie
text: DO NOT USE for ANY Carpet stretching.!! This company is full of deceiving liars.  They schedule appointments, don’t show up as promised. Don’t waste any time with them.  2 scheduled appointments and the person on the phone just lies about it.

name: Anthony Dean
text: They are such a pleasure to work with.  Low pressure, great customer service, good prices, big selection, and fast installation. We will shop with them again

name: Jana Whealdon
text: We recently used Kirkley Floor Covering  to replace our engineered wood floors. We got estimates from four companies and we chose Kirkley mainly because of how much we liked the estimator Jordan and the front office person Melissa. They are both very courteous and trustworthy. Our installer Mark did an awesome job, and the owner Ken made a point of coming by to check on the project and introduce himself. We highly recommend Kirkley Floor Covering and would not hesitate to use them again in the future.

name: Michele Remolde
text: We have purchased carpet and laminate type flooring from Kirkley over the last two years. The installation processes and customer service was great. The quality of the products was great as well. We are very satisfied customers.

name: Elizabeth Whatley
text:
Very professional; great selection of ceramic tile, marble, and carpet styles, all of which we ordered for our new home.
They were very knowledgable of what carpet to suggest for the  high traffic areas in our new home that would stand up to three toddlers! We are pleased with our plush and stain resistant carpet for the upstairs of our home... (After a nail polish spill, thanks to my 3 year old twins, I called Melissa in a panic and she walked me through the "removal" process over the phone! Now I can't tell it ever happened!)
Highly recommend Kirkley Flooring. Costumer service was great, quick to resolve any issues. They even ordered me samples of tile I had seen on Pinterest that I liked. Very pleased overall with our experience!

name: Judy ONeal
text: We have used Kirkley Floor Covering for two recent renovations at our Lakehouse.  We added a room to the lakehouse and put in hardwood floors.  The lower floor and stairs required a good bit of prep work to install carpeting.  Our experiences with Kirkley have been very positive - always professional, patient and timely.  I would recommend Kirkley to our friends.

name: Jerry White
text:
Some of the best people on the planet work there !
I ought to know I work there as well and have for nearly 20 years ,🙂

text:
My new laminate floors are wonderful. KIRKLEY DID A AWESOME JOB. VERY PROFESSIONAL JOB AND QUALITY WORK. THEY ARE A GREAT COMPANY.
Tiffany Doolittle

name: Mario Lightfoote
text: Andrew and Hunter were prompt, professional and polite. Expert craftsmen.  If you don't go with Prestige,  you're wasting your money.

name: N Mills
text:
Thank you!  The workmanship was impeccable.  The men were professional and I will recommend you to all my friends.  When we need any flooring projects done we will be calling you!  Again thank you and Mike and his helper.  You can’t tell where they fixed the floor.  It looks perfect. Sincerely,
Nancy Mills

name: Kristi McCarty
text: Guys came our after hours to repair my carpet from pet damage. They were very professional, fast and reasonable. You can't even tell there was ever any damage in that spot. Thank you for taking the time to come all the way to Millbrook and I will highly recommend Prestige Flooring!

name: Megan Purdy
text: Prestige Flooring has been amazing to work with. I recently moved in a 1920s house where the bathroom was in need of a major update. Being an old home of course came with its issues (uneven walls and floors). I even ordered my own floor tile and unfortunately miscalculated the amount of tile need (it was hexagonal tile so needed a fair amount of cuts) but Andrew and his team worked really well to use all the tile and make it work. They did an amazing job with the subway tile (super even on the wall even when the wall was not smooth). The bathroom is still in the works however will post a picture when its done. For anyone deciding between DIY and hiring someone it is definitely worth hiring Prestige!

name: Jeremiah Davis
text: This group is top notch. Great service and fair price. Skip the big box stores and go local!

name: Brooke Watson
text: Prestige is my go-to any time I have clients needing tile or flooring work done! They have awesome prices and even better customer service! Plus they’re locally owned and just good, honest people. Can’t beat that!

name: Rita M. Comer
text: On 1 Mar 19, Chris and crew arrived to do my new flooring.  I'm very pleased with their work.  They were very professional, and I could tell that Chris really enjoys his job.  If ever I decide to do some more work, Prestige Flooring of Auburn will be the one that I will call.  In fact, if ever I'm asked if I know of an excellent company, I will definitely give him/her  their info.  I would also like to comment on their office assistant, Kim, that she is very helpful, nice, and professional--a definite asset to their place of business.

name: Chris O
text: Really pleased with the work they did. Very accommodating and the tile they installed looks great. Would definitely use them again.

text: My experience with Wheat’s has been amazing! Tracy is thorough, thoughtful, and wonderfully nice! text: Durrell and Troy were efficient and the quality of their work is outstanding. They moved furniture and put it all back after floor installation. There are no gaps and every board is situated perfectly. I highly recommend using Wheats Carpet  and Flooring for your home … especially Durrell and Troy!

name: kedurham2
text: Wheat's has done a lot of good work on our home. Jamin has been the utmost professional project manager and Andres an incredible installer. Andres is so kind and professional and makes sure everything is just right. They both are a pleasure to work with.

name: Mary Billups
text: From the design to the installation, working with Tracy Gooden and Marcos was a true pleasure.  I'll definitely choose Wheat's Carpet One for my next project!

name: Howard Baker
text:
My wife and I made the decision to have carpet replaced in the entire home. We had 4 companies come out and measure and Wheat's not only offered us the best price but they were also the most professional.

Once our carpet arrived an installation date was set and the installers came the day they were supposed to and arrived on time. There was a mix up from the measurement to the plans and 1 of the 4 bedrooms did not get ordered but they ordered it and setup a second install. They also did not charge us for the mistake and assured us immediately it would not be on us to take care of.

Our installers did such an amazing job for the first 4 rooms and 4 closets that we requested for them to send the same crew for the final bedroom and closet and they did. My wife and I never once had to come behind them and ask them to fix a mistake they made. They were very professional and extremely good at what they did. I want to thank the team of Mike, Shane and Austin for outstanding work and customer service. I HIGHLY recommend Wheat's and will use them again!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the opportunity to work in your home.   You know mistakes happen, I am sorry for the left off room originally.   I am glad we were able to take care of it for you and dust off properly after we fell in order to keep you pleased with your choice of Wheat's Carpet One.   We are truly honored to have been your choice and to recieve the kind words of your review.
Thanks and we hope to see you again!

name: Cindi Greenawalt
text: Tracey was the best with helping us get new carpet and hardwoods  put into our house we just moved into. We moved from out of state and our wonderful realtor Wes referred  us to Wheats.Tracy is so professional and helpful from the first meeting till our last installment of hardwood. She knows her products and guided us to the right products. The installation  team for the carpet was exceptional as was the hardwood team..5 stars to them all!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review, we are happy to have you in town!  Tracy is great and we are honored you gave us the opportunity to serve your family.

text: When I went to Wheat’s Carpet they were the best and most courteous people.  I needed carpet quickly, because I was having family coming.  I talked with the owner about what he could do to help me. He went above and beyond to get a crew to my house to install the carpet in record time.  They did an amazing job!  Thank you to Wheat’s Carpet for saving the day!

resp.text: Thanks for the great 5 star review, Frances! We're thrilled to hear that our team was courteous and did an excellent job. We hope that you enjoy your new carpet!

text: Very helpful and lots of tile selections.

resp.text: Regina, We appreciate the time you took to give us 5-stars! We are glad that you enjoyed our selection of tiles. We look forward to providing you with more great experiences in the near future. See you next time!

name: Andrew Humphries
text:
My reply since I couldn’t figure out how to reply to your response: This is my apt, multiple people are not allowed in and out of my apt. Who my leasing management contracts with has nothing to do with who enters my apt. Management keeps a key sign out sheet for all residents. Your company was the only one on that list since I moved in 3 months prior, with the exception of maintenance. You told the judge that you never had my key. (I did have this sheet during court) Wheats and the employees name was signed on the the key sign-out sheet. I made a police report. I had an investigation done, you were contacted. In addition, you did not complete the installation. My bedroom and closet was to be installed, only my bedroom got installed. Why? Because the closet was full. Why? Because there was no notice of your arrival. When your men came through the door and realized that my apt did not look prepared for their arrival, they should of picked up the phone and called. They did not. My gold necklace was in pure sight. Literally right in the way of the items in which your men felt comfortable to move without permission. I’m not in the business of ruining businesses, I am also not in the business of paying for a service and getting robbed. If wheats wanted to make it right, management would of contacted me and apologized, wheats would of replaced my necklace and/or fired the employee who stole it. They did none of those things. Wheats has denied these allegations from the very beginning. Why? Imagine, Coming back home with my house looking crazy, all my personal items were all over my living room floor. Imagine the trauma that I have had to endure since that day. This is something I will never ever forget. It was totally traumatizing, degrading and unexpected and the worst part is, there was no apology. Only denial, denial, denial. No resolution. This could of all went away with a phone call, resolution and apology from management. They didn’t even call and apologize. Nothing. It’s one thing to make a mistake, it is a whole different thing to not acknowledge it.

FYI: I wore that necklace almost everyday, I didn’t that day. Why would your worker think I would not realize it was missing! I knew the second I walked in the door on that Tuesday that it was missing! Why would I make this up?!

Initial post: Wheats furniture stole my gold necklace. They entered my home without proper permission from the renter. They signed out a key from the property manager after then denied ever having touched my key. We went to court, they lied and said they never touched the key even after showing them that they were the ones that signed my key out of the office. The lied. They are criminals. They stole my items and traumatized my whole life. It’s a whole year later and I can’t even allow anyone in my apt...do maintenance, showing, ect, without me being present. Everyone makes mistakes, wheats can’t control what their workers do but they could of made it right. Instead they lied and brought their big time lawyer to a small claims court hearing 😒 traumatized isn’t even the right word to describe my experience with this company. Good luck.

Also, my apt paid for the carpet to be changed in both the bedroom and the closet. They completed the work in the bedroom and did not touch the closet, but charged for both the bedroom and the closet. They didn’t even return the items back to my room. Imagine coming home and seeing your items all over the living room floor. I first thought I was robbed, then realized I wasn’t, then realized moments later that I was indeed robbed of my gold necklace. It was in plain sight before I left the house that morning. It was in the direct view of where they were doing work, it would be hard to miss. If there were proper notice to me, and proper responsibility taken by Wheats, this could of been resolved properly. Wheats completely denied it, lied on the stand and continues to act as if they are loyal franchise. Never ever again.

resp.text: Hello, Andrew. In 2018, when we completed this installation, we were concerned by this allegation as you know. We advised you to make a police report and that we would cooperate  with them on their investigation and provide any information and access to our people they needed. We have never had an accusation like this before. Also because multiple subcontractors, from other companies contracted by the apartment complex, including their people were in and out of your apartment at the time of installation any number of people had access. When you took this to court, the judge found in our favor due to us not being the only people in the unit that day. At this time, we feel that we have done everything we can to remedy this situation. We are sorry for your loss. Thank you.

name: Jim Rainey
text: Tracy is a great sales person. She is very professional and very thorough. She does a great job of explaining exactly what to expect.

resp.text: Jim, thank you! We truly appreciate your 5-star rating and kind words about our team.

text: Currently very unhappy with this company. All we have to go on is our word against the associate at Wheat's. It is during these times that you realize that you can't count on anyone but yourself. I recommend having everything in explicit writing when (and a big IF) dealing with Wheat's even if you're working with a contractor - for your own sake.

name: Charlotte Reed
text:
Walked into the store needing new flooring for our living room and kitchen area.  I felt a little overwhelmed by all the choices as there were so many styles and colors to choose from.
The salesman was very patient and helpful and his suggestions along with their design team on staff, I was allowed to take several samples home to check out.  I found the perfect flooring and even came in under budget.  Needless to say, my husband was very pleased.   I highly recommend Wheats!

name: Matt Cook
text:
Bottom line: Would not recommend them for your tile/flooring needs.

Beware a company that makes you pay in full up front. They have no skin in the game to finish the job on time.

On first impressions the company seems on the up and up, nice show room, large selection, and friendly staff. We contracted with Wheat's to come out, do the measurement, order the tile, and install.

We were constantly told that they would call us with an update to never receive the call. When we in turn had to call them to check in, The sales rep's story was always different from what we got from anyone else. We were told by more than one employee that the product was on backorder with no specified delivery date then our sales rep would tell us it would be in the next day. When we called the next day, again, item was still on back order, but the sales rep would tell us another story. We were never contacted by our sales rep to tell us that one of our tile selections was on back order. Once the tile finally came in, one of the orders was the wrong product and the other order wasn't enough (bad estimation by Wheat's staff). No one checked to ensure it was the right material and the installers were mid installation before I saw it and told them they had the wrong tile. Now we're on another delay while they reorder the right tile. Again, we were told 1-2 days shipping for the correct tile. A week later and several more no returned calls and moving deadlines later, the tile finally came in. It took nearly 6 weeks to get a small bathroom remodel done and this wasn't because the install crew was busy, they were usually quick to call us to schedule a time once the material came in.

Pros:
good selection
install steam seemed squared away and did a good job

Cons:
pay in full up front (not a break down like typical contractor work)
lack of communication
inaccurate communication
well past original dead line

resp.text: Mr. Cook you are absolutely right. We did not deliver the service that you expected, deserve, and that we try daily to achieve.   We missed the mark.   I hope that now that the job is completed  you are happy with the end result.   I sincerely apologize for issues you experienced at our hands.   If you would like to further discuss this matter I am happy to help.
