name: Reese Shipley
text: Ben Colburn was a huge help and made shopping for vinyl flooring a great experience. I ducked in on a Saturday because I heard a radio add for a sale they were having. He immediately greeted me and answered every question I had about vinyl plank flooring. Ben even let me take some sample display boards home to make sure we got the color we wanted as we thought about things. I called Ben the next day and he came out within two hours to measure the house. I was quickly sent many quotes a few for the entire house, ones without labor, and ones with labor. I thought I would do the installation myself, and Ben took the time to answer every question I had about installation even though he was not required to. The flooring arrived very quickly! After attempting a room I realized I was in over my head with the installation and did not have the help or time to do the house. Ben was quick to answer my call and got me scheduled for the installation. I was very pleased with my experience and the prices were great.  I had looked almost everywhere in town before going to Wheats and I’m so glad I stopped by! Ben made the experience great and I was treated like a friend not a client! If you need flooring Wheats is the only way to go! Ask for Ben!

name: Sandy Colvin
text: It was a stressful installation.  The crew started laying final flooring while the other crew were doing rip out of tile with dust and particles everywhere and walking/grinding it all into the new vinyl plank flooring they were installing.  I noted my concerns and this only made the installers upset and also called the store.  When it began to rain they left, I walked in and they were gone!  I had told them they needed to clean up before they left and their reply to me was they only clean up once at the end of their job and they weren't done!!  This wasn't a construction zone, they were doing a job in my home where I was to cook and sleep!!  I was upset as you can imagine and called the store.  The store manager and the salesman that sold me the product came out and video taped it and said they would discuss this and stayed an hour to clean up so I could eat my dinner and sleep.  The next day the same went on.  I noted one plank installed was damaged their reply to me was it came out of the box that way?  Well I don't know about me but that should have been thrown away and if the store didn't order extra (where there was no pieces left over)  but they should have ordered more encase of such and their solution was to pull out a "stain marker" and color it so it wasn't noticeable!  I paid $8,358.51 for new installed product not damaged and painted!!  This product is warrantied and said if we are at any time unhappy with it or find problems with it they will come back and re do.  As much as I hate it because its a huge inconvenience but we have found more damaged boards and a lump under the flooring that is probably debris from the doing construction and install at the same time. The manager did offer to pay for the cleaning supplies I had to rush out to purchase after the first day of installation but I have not been back to the store.  My time is limited currently as this is a second home of ours but I need to address this because as customers we deserve good service and the quality product we buy.  Disappointed.  Thought paying almost double what the competitors bidded I'd be getting better quality, disappointed so far.

resp.text: Mrs. Colvin, I undertand that there were some headaches and stress throughout the installation but I wanted to confirm that at this point everything is good and we have been able to handle the issues in a manner that is acceptable...

text: I really liked the way they were patient with me, Jamin Carter  took the time to make sure that I was satisfied with what I wanted. I was impressed with the quality of material and the design that was  presented to me. Ask for Jamin, he will take care of you.

name: Jason Polancich
text: Recently bought carpet from these folks after finding them ranked well in Google. The salesman was on-time, professional and provided a timely quote based on the options we chose. It all however went wrong when the installation happened. They called us to install earlier than expected, but it seems they were trying to squeeze us into a spot wherein someone cancelled, so the hope on their end was to complete the work in one single day. They then sent only two guys out: one very good who did all the work and one who did nothing but grouse and complain loudly all day.  Ive always wondered why people who clearly hate their work continue to do it at all? At any rate, they didnt complete the job in one day, then attempted to pull the "crew" onto another job the next day. After calling to complain we had adjusted a major furniture delivery based on their moving the date up, they sent out their installation manager to berate my wife while I was away about my complaints. Needless to say, cannot recommend.

resp.text:
Mr. Polancich,
I am sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with Wheat’s Carpet One.   From our phone conversation I hope you understand that it is not who we are or acceptable to our business practice.  We strive for every experience our clients have with Wheat’s Carpet One to not only be positive but to also be fun through the process.  As we discussed, I assure you that the instances you brought to my attention are being handled appropriately so that we are able to learn and grow from these  opportunities.

Jamin Carter

text: We recently had engineered vinyl plank flooring installed in our living and dining areas and were completely satisfied with the experience we had with Wheat's Carpet One.  The sales person, Tracy Gooden was extremely helpful and courteous, and the installation performed by Jiovanni and Caesar was efficient and totally professional.  We could not be happier with the result. We were installing EVP with hardwood in adjoining areas and the match was excellent.  Their quote was also significantly less than a major competitor. We would highly recommend Wheat's, if you're shopping for a flooring company.

text:
The folks at Wheats are very courteous and professional. We had them do our entire main floor in LVT and the coordinator and installers did a great job and worked around my schedule. We are going to have them back to do some carpeting in our loft/guest room. :)
Highly recommend!

name: Amber Burt
text: 0 Stars. Do not even think about walking through these doors. We chose a flooring that we were persuaded into bc it was waterproof and we had kids. They sent an installation crew that was awful. The color did not match what we picked out 10%. He company didn’t check our moisture levels under our crawl space or put any pads down. The worst installation ever. Such a joke. They agreed to let us pick out new floors and have their A crew with non stop management watch the second install. Never choose a company that offered lifetime install. It’s bc they do it right the first time. Also in another review I read don’t ever use somebody that requires all money up front. Our nightmare lasted a year. Their defected flooring caused moisture issues bc of laying on a crawl space. We paid an engineer and another flooring place to inspect. It was proved that it was because on the product. The LVP flooring as pages of bad consumer reports. In December 2018 we ended with getting a little more than half of your money back. Leaving their poor product and many new issues on sub floor. They kept 4,000$. We could have won in court but didn’t want to spend another year fighting them. The owner Don is a very rude person. Talks to women they are stupid. He lives out of state so forget him helping when he messes your house up. I’m a hair stylist in town and I know 7 other people that they have screwed over. People don’t have time to fight and file lawsuits so he gets away with it. I wouldn’t wish my experience on anyone.

text: I'm not satisfied with the flooring that was installed in my home. I chose the color but other details about the vinyl flooring wasn't given. I expressed my feelings and dissatisfaction durning the installation and afterwards to the store manager. He stated that he agree that more information should have been given about the flooring. No satisfaction guaranteed! I'm stuck with this flooring now.

name: Chad Pitts
text: Our house flooded due to hot water heater drain valve breaking in the middle of the night. All of the floors in the house had to be replaced. text: I originally posted a terrible review but I’m adjusting due to the excellent customer service we received in resolving the issue. Three series of events, our flooring install was a nightmare. Melissa at cams didn’t wonderful job making sure that everything was done correctly and even arrange for their installers to help bring our washer and dryer into the house. She also applied a significant discount for all the trouble we went through.

name: Jerika Mofield
text:
I am actually quite sad that I am having to leave a bad review for this place considering they were recommended to me by Home Depot and actually started out by impressing us with excellent customer service, but that ended quickly. Please read full review to understand the situation...

Approximately two months ago my husband and I came to Kemp's to try to find a transition piece that would match the pre-existing laminate flooring in our house. Upon entering Kemp's, we were immediately taken care of. We were super impressed by one of the ladies being able to look at the sample of our floor we brought and have an idea right away of a color that might match. She said she would have to order a sample and took down our information and said she would call us sometime the following week when it would come in.

Well, two weeks go by and we hadn't heard anything so we decided to stop into the store and just see what was up. We weren't mad or upset at all, but just curious. The store manager was actually at the front desk and she was not aware of the situation entirely, but she promised to get it sorted and she personally took down our information and promised to contact us the following week. Well, after that I received at least 3 phone calls from her in the following weeks explaining that the specific laminate was on backorder and she would call me whenever it came in. This was all fine and we appreciated the constant contact. Unfortunately, it all went downhill from there...

We waited at least two more weeks without hearing anything from them before I decided to call again and see what was going on. By now, it had been over a month and we still hadn't even received a sample of that color of laminate to see if it matched, let alone the floor transition piece we actually needed. When I called, I spoke to the receptionist and she said she looked me up in the computer and that our piece was on the truck to be DELIVERED THAT DAY and she would call me when it arrived. I did not receive a phone call that day.

Again, we let at least two weeks go by and heard NOTHING still. So, my husband calls them just trying to figure out what was going on and the lady he spoke to on the phone was VERY rude. He thinks her name was Barbara? This lady told him that the person who originally helped us didn't work there anymore and that they had no record of the order and it wasn't even possible to get a sample of that flooring in. My husband tried to explain to her everything we had been through and all the things (apparently lies) we had been told and she just kept interrupting him. He asked to speak to the manager and she said the manager was busy. She ended the phone call basically telling him that they couldn't help us and to try going somewhere else instead. Really?? Literally two months, if not longer, dealing with this place just to be told to go somewhere else and they couldn't help us and basically everything we had been told was a lie!

Sorry for the long post, but it is important to know the full story because I would never leave a bad review unless I am extremely dissatisfied.

name: Lynn Hollingsworth
text: I visited this store unsure of what I would find. I was very pleased with the entire experience! I was greeted at the door and asked questions as to what I was looking for and which room of my home it was for. After telling the lady, she promptly took me to the lady who seemed to know exactly what I was wanting. The team members are very knowledgeable and so very polite. They listened to what was in my mind and provided me with many options! I will definitely be back to see them!

text: We were extremely happy with the prompt service, outstanding products and the installers did an outstanding job.  Next time we need some flooring we know where to go.  Thanks a million Susan we really appreciate everything.

text: Very helpful staff. And nice selections

name: D & M Blonshine
text: Awesome very helpful

name: Nicholas Lipari
text:
Where to start. I had Kemp's do 12x24 marble tile in my kitchen.
Installer did a rush job because apparently he had better places to be. Cracked tile, chipped tile, uneven tile. The grout was miscolored and had tons of bubbles in it. I had to take a day off of work so they could come and redo the grout.
Installer never showed, called Kemp's... opps we forgot.
After the grout was fixed I was still unhappy about the cracked, chipped, uneven tile.
To Kemp's credit they offered to fix cracked and uneven tile, however, they were unwilling to repair the chipped tile. They had the audacity to tell me it was damaged in shipping and it wasn't their problem.
Seems too difficult for them to understand I didn't buy tile from some dude off the street I had bought it from Kemp's. I don't give a rip if it get's damaged in shipping. Would you accept a new car with a few dents and a cracked wind shield? Opps sorry it got damaged in shipping give us our money.

Don't waste your time with Kemp's there's a reason they want money upfront.

name: Karen Trigger
text: The job is half done; I know  I  will not go back for more flooring  after this job is done.  Worker do not know much English .  They play very  loud music.  They leave doors open, at 45 degrees, it is cold.  I could  go on..

name: Janis Sheila
text: Have done business with Kemp's multiple times ... both personal home and rental homes.  Always top-shelf!  Great people, great products, great pricing.  I wouldn't go anywhere else.  My experience with Kemp's goes back many years .... most recently in the last 12 months.

name: DeAnna Esler
text: I had the best experience with Kemp's Flooring. My husband and I bought a home and quickly realized we were going to have to replace the carpet. We went and looked at carpet on a Tuesday and they were able to put it in on Wednesday. Jeff the sales associate we worked with was also extremely helpful. Initially my husband and I were hesitant about buying new carpet because of the expensive of buying a new home, but we couldn't be happier with our decision.

name: Sharon Smith
text: Excellent service from assistance with selection through the installation process!  We have used Kemp's several times over the past three years for carpet replacement and wood flooring installation.  Each and every staff member is knowledgeable and helpful.  Melissa is our "go to" associate at Kemp's.  She makes good suggestions and walks you through the pros and cons.  She is on top of all the details, stays in contact and is quick to resolve any issues.  It's obvious that the owners fully support their staff and stand behind the product and workmanship. Excellent experience all the way around!

name: Chris Harper
text:
Great customer service, I purchased Shaw laminate and love it! It was very easy to install and looks great. The sales staff was very helpful in helping me make a selection.
Thanks Kemp's Flooring!

name: S. W.
text: Great front office staff!

name: MirrorImage Salon
text: They are very helpful and really know a lot about flooring.

name: Joey Rogers
text: The service and workmanship Kemp’s provided on both my tile and carpet installations were well below my expectations.   A two day job took over a week to complete.  The work was simply handed off to sub-contractors that were more interested in working on their other jobs than mine.   In the end, the job that was performed was unacceptable, and they had to come back and redo it.   I think the person from Kemp’s was even shocked by the quality of the work when I had them come back out to fix it.   I also tried to contact the owner to complain about the job that was performed.  I never heard back.

name: D. Schmachtenberger
text: I really dislike this place. I ordered wood flooring and carpet. When the installers came, they only installed the carpet and 2/3s of the wood flooring. I expected them to come back to finish but they never did. A day later I got a call from some women in the office. And she wanted the payment. I told her they weren't finished and she said " oh yes were are'! I said well I am looking at the foyer and it hasn't been done. She called me a liar, and said she would get back to me after she talked to the crew. This women was horrible to me,  she never called back but sent a bill minus the foyer wood floor. So they never finished, nor did they ever apologize for calling me a liar. I went back a few years later for one of my rental houses and they were 2 times HIGHER $$ then the  other estimates I got. I ended up going to Moran Carpets in Athens and THEY were awesome.

name: Bobby Pate
text: Cause I work 4 them

name: Sheri Spuhl
text: I like the ladies on the rug side. I bought 2 rugs for a staging project. A bit difficult getting in & out of lot on Hwy 72.  It's on my go-to list of places for rugs & flooring.

name: Andy Harrison
text: Beware!

name: Dr L
text: Great selection of flooring & wall - tile, laminate (wood & vinal) custom order and reference of skilled installers. Locations in Mobile & Baldwin county. Better selection than big box stores better quality also.

name: Irene Watsom
text: Ronnie took my rotten uneven floor and made it beautiful again!  Thanks!

resp.text: So glad to hear! We appreciate your business!

name: Darren Armstrong
text: Very nice selection of towels for floor and wall or any other decorative aspects the staff are wonderful very welcoming and has knowledge to help you complete your project

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Wade Parnell
text:
Wonderful people.
Very helpfull.

resp.text: We appreciate your business! Thank you!

name: Dan S
text: Great people that go out of their way to help you find what you want. Great customer service and prices. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank You! We appreciate your business!

name: marc guffey
text: Awesome displays..lots of choice quality tile with a very knowledgeable staff

resp.text: We appreciate your review! Thanks!

name: Anthony Welborn

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! Much appreciated!

name: Larry Miller
text: Great selection and wonderful list of installers. Been doing business there over 40 years.

resp.text: We appreciate your continued business!

name: Chad kiper
text: Shannon was super helpful. Great people. Great prices. They will not try and sell you something you don't need. Will purchase more flooring from these fine folks.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Chad! I am sure Shannon will be more than happy to help you with future purchases!

name: Matthew Van Duyn
text: Great selection of tile and great service.

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Kim Leousis
text: Been doing business with them since 2005. Good prices and quality. Staff are very helpful.  Location is accessible.

resp.text: Thanks so much Kim! We appreciate your business!

name: AA N
text: They always work with me ...to get me everything i need to complete my jobs....i highly recomend going here....they do try to be very helpful....

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback! Thanks!

name: Steven Hall
text: Easy to find location. The employees and owner  are helpful and wonderful local people to do business with. Walk-in are welcome, appointments are preferred.

name: Kathy Rhinehart
text: Love them have used them for flooring since forever always happy with help recieved

resp.text: We appreciate your business! Thank You!

name: John Tesch
text: Fabulous experience wonderful personalities very knowledgeable in the business  Definitely recommend them

resp.text: Thanks so much for the 5 star review!

name: RC

resp.text: So glad we could help!

name: Joel Minto

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback! Thanks so much!

text: One of,the best place to go,if u building or remodeling ,,a great sale team,, with great knowledge,, with great materials.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback! We appreciate your business!

name: Tiger Williams
text: Was great.people are super

resp.text: Thanks so much for your business!

name: Chuck Walls
text: Selections good

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback! Thank You!

name: Nick Rivers
text: Great place and great people

resp.text: Thanks Nick!

name: Don't Ask Won't tell
text:
They installed flooring in our house and it looks amazing! They installed ceramic tile in our kitchen and it looks fantastic!
We are going to have a walk in shower installed in our master bath and we have no doubt that it will look great as well. These are fine folks to do business with and the install crews know what they are doing. I highly recommend Pfeffer Floor Covering! Great customer service!

name: Tami Harris
text:
Professional and Personalized Service.
Not like a Big Box Hardware Store.
They know their product and educate the buyer on differences of product and Pros and Cons of each type.
Excellent Service

name: Austin Hooks
text: Not sure how all these good reviews got on here but definitely not true. They did the worst grout job on my subway tiled shower I’ve ever seen. I paid for a white subway tile shower with white grout. Once the job was finished I noticed that the grout was super yellow and it turns out they used the wrong water and it discolored the grout. Would not fix the grout and instead told me it was the right color. So after there mistake I called a professional tile worker who stained the grout for me and then it made it obvious how horribly messy and crooked the grout lines were. Will never recommend this company to anyone.

name: Paul Garner
text: Great service

name: Annette Sebastian
text: Just had Arlene help us pick out carpeting and her brother and nephew installed.   Great service and prices!    Love supporting family businesses that know the meaning of service to the customer!  Thanks Arlene!

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: Good selection of tile, good staff. Closed on weekends.

name: Stephen Williams
text: Every type of quality flooring under the sun.  36 years and counting serving the community.  Excellent staff.  Highly recommend.

name: Chad Breaux
text: Arlene put new flooring in my home. Great job and a pleasure to work with.

name: Carna Triftshauser
text:
Worst Customer Service. I purchased tile on Sept 28th and still don’t have my full order. Last week I emailed 3 times and called. NO RESPONSE. I was told the last box shipped on 10/26 on Nov 2 and that it would be here Nov 3rd. I arrived on Nov 5th to pick it up and was then told it was shipped yesterday and hopefully it might be here on the 6th. Not even an I’m sorry for all the issues. Just tossed the paper back to me through a gate and said oh well.

WILL NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!!

name: Amanda
text: Started off with a great experience at the sales office. While the two employees working the office could not provide a solution to my issue they asked for me to leave my contact information with them, and provided the business card for a coworker that might be able to help. I was told they would have that person give me a call to set up an appointment to have someone come out to my house to see if they can troubleshoot my issue and possibly come up with a solution. After nearly a week there has been no communication from them. Instead, I had to call the person on the business card only to then be told he was not the right person and that he needed to have someone else call me back instead. Still waiting on that call back. My problem is that I bought a set of glass fireplace doors for my fireplace that I should be able to easily install myself, but they do not fit by just a few millimeters in height. I have double checked that I got the correct doors. I know the manufacturer and model number of my fireplace, so I bought the coordinating doors for my fireplace. I am worried that the fireplace and/or tile surround was not done properly and therefore might be the cause of my issue. Please beware this company installs the fireplaces and does the tile/brick work for Lowder New Homes, so if you are a Lowder homeowner you could run into similar issues in the future!!

name: Joseph Farris
text: Told me an order would be delivered in a week took over 3 months and were near impossible to communicate with

name: Missy Powell
text: Beautiful Store. Unbelievable selection, too many to choose. Friendly, Experienced assistance to help you with your choice. Can order anything also!

name: Janie Sims
text: Elizabeth was awesome and can really perfect items by putting them together

name: Shelia Hammonds
text: Great selection  of tile and customer y

name: Daisy Pippin
text: They have an awesome and unique, one of a  selection of flooring,tile, countertops,etc.

name: Josh Hamby
text: Higher price but better quality than Lowes and Home Depot

name: Matt Allen
text: Davis Cox is awesome to work with. Found the Brick that was perfect. Thanks Buddy.

name: Taylor Chatham
text:
I am giving acme brick 1 star for their pretty displays on kitchen backslashes. Its hard to see the samples the way they are hung. Which isnt a deal breaker but brick color advice from 2 team members was very alarming!

I went with a photo of a fence we will be adding to. I said verbatim to the lady at the front desk & she asked to see the pic and told old tavern in a mere glance. Im an artist and when i saw old tavern I wanted to see someone who knew a thing or two ..... i got the same answer!!!!!!!????!!

I knew immediately I wasn't kookie so I researched it and instantly felt like a side by side would do justice and more than that it did. However,  I may buy from them under my alias but am weary of how much i can trust these people. Research and think ahead before going if u do decide to.

name: Christopher Lancaster
text: Fast  prompt service...in and out with a breeze

name: Sean
text:
The staff showed us a previously unconsidered option for our new patio, ultra hard and thick porcelain! It's been installed a few years now and we're extremely grateful we didn't go with real or fake stone.
Also, they carry Fire Magic grills, a very high quality American made line of grills.

name: randy taylor
text: This place is the perfect place to go if you wanna meet someone who calls their uncle, daddy! Intelligence level of gum stuck to the bottom of a table. They way over charge you for their product. Go to the source it's way cheaper, I know one supplier is Sioux city brick. Their are many more in Alabama. Cut the middle man out save yourself some time and money.

name: Charles Britton
text: I'm a drver deliverd here dont turn on street in front go to Intergraph way street on other side of motel to make a brick delivery tight yard..didn't take long to unload me. But it close to closing on a Friday ...

name: Janice Henry
text: Excellent pricing and selection.

name: Skinner Family
text: Great selection and knowledgeable staff. Happy to bring my business here.

name: Jonathon H.
text: ACME Brick and Tile is an amazing local company and I whole heartedly recommend them. They donated all of the pavers for my Eagle Project at Aldersgate Methodist Church on time with no problems. They help the community and provide excellent service.

name: Ruby Winkles
text: Very helpful picking out tile for my bathroom

name: Walter Walker
text: EXTREMELY helpful staff. I will use them again.

name: Steve P.
text: Called at 4:20pm on a normal working day. There message said they were open till 5:00pm. You should answer the phone during normal business hours. If you can't, don't post them.

name: Richard Agee
text: worse customer service I've seen in a long time,  don't answer there phones cant get your delivery when scheduled.

name: Theodore Warren
text: Hated

name: Shawn Abol
text:
worse place i shopped
because of there delivery

name: James Lamar
text: I had granite countertops installed in my kitchen along with the backsplash about two years ago and have not been happy since. The granite has a lot of pits in it and the carpetland salesman said that was normal, I’m sure it’s not. The backsplash was installed and cut to go around power outlets which we could have moved up if we had been asked to. I wasn’t home when the backsplash was installed so I had no input in it. They also dinged up several walls and again was told that’s normal. I did not push the issue since I was already told that the granite pitting was normal. I was going to go over there and talk to management, but Covid struck and didn’t get to. I live about 45 - 60 minutes from the store. Every time I go in my kitchen I am disappointed in the work they did. I’m sure after two years they will probably do nothing about it. I have learned my lesson!

resp.text: Mr. Lamar,  we are as disappointed as you are when we receive this type of review.  It has been brought to the attention of management and and ownership for review.  In the meantime, please don't hesitate to call us at 334-793-1004.  Thank you.

name: Sara Braswell
text: I had a great experience with Carpetland! Thank you Tami Johnson for helping me pick out the perfect carpet that I needed. Kind, courteous and knowledgeable. The installers did a great job... Reid, his wife and Dean. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you!  Your business is appreciated.

name: Gina Medley
text:
My experience with Carpetland in Dothan has been incredibly smooth. The craftsmanship is awesome. The customer service is top notch!  Everyone has been a pleasure to work with making out building process go seamlessly.
I can’t say enough about the team of professional craftsman- thorough and detailed. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We appreciate your kind words and putting your trust in us.

name: Debra Riley
text: Can't wait to get the new carpet in.  Everyone was so helpful.   I'll be doing more bussiness there.

name: Darlene Hicks
text: My husband and I decided to do some updating to our home. I went in to Carpetland and told Tami what we had in mind. After listening to us, she went and pulled samples of tiles, flooring and granite and it was exactly what we had in mind. She led us each step of the way. Ricardo was sent to put the floors down and was so meticulous. The finished product was beautiful. Terry (and wife- sorry I forgot her name) put tile in the kitchen and did a great job.  Next, the bathroom, and can’t wait to see it completed.

name: Julia Moore
text: Michelle was an amazing asset while we were building our forever home. She made a stressful process so easy! She always kept me up to date on everything. She always had a smile on her face and positive attitude; regardless of what was going on. She's amazing and I can't thank her enough for all the help she gave us during the building process.

name: Richetta Worlds
text: Terrible service!!! The customer service representative is very rude and unprofessional. I have worked in customer service for a long time and I quite honestly dont know how this company still exist. They never return phone calls. I tried to make a complaint about some flooring tile that was installed and all they gave me was excuses and never tried to resolve my problem. Even if they were not going to do a single thing to help me at least have the decency to follow up with a phone call. I spent over 8,000.00 in flooing at this store and they treated me like trash after I spent my money with them. Do not use this company,  they are GARBAGE!!

resp.text:
Mrs. Worlds,
In a situation such as this, we’ll send a manager to inspect the issue and to determine a resolution. If the issue is still unresolved we forward your complaint to the manufacturer’s representatives and ask for their recommendation.  In this case both Carpetland’s management and the manufacturer agreed that the stain resistance in your specific carpet will not withstand the traffic in the area where it was installed. If you wish to consider an option presented to you, please contact Carpetland USA’s retail sales manager.

name: Mrs. Suarez
text: IMO best flooring and granite store around

resp.text: Thank you so much!!  We appreciate you putting your trust in us :-)

name: Mikael Ash
text: Sales Representative Cindy was truly outstanding...keeping us in our budget while meeting our needs

resp.text: Thank you very much! We appreciate you and your trust in our company!!

name: Trina Turk
text:
Carpetland USA in Dothan is a beautiful place to shop. I went in looking for carpet and Michelle waited on me. She was very sweet and attentive to the kind of carpet I was looking for. We didn't purchase that day, I wanted to talk it over with my husband. Michelle stayed in touch with me. She called me to let me know of a secret sale they were having. It was a great sale. Too great to pass up. Needless to say, I purchased the carpet I wanted at a GREAT price and it was installed before Thanksgiving like I had requested.
The two men who did the install did a fantastic job! They cleaned up and vacuumed all the rooms before they left. I will definitely be purchasing from Carpetland USA in Dothan for my future flooring and remodeling!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great Five Star review!!

name: Reed York
text: We started with this company when was had are floors install. They did a fantastic job with the floor and Cindy has been wonderful. We decided to have carpet land do are countertops. They called us last week and told us it was going to be installed today on the 24th. They never showed up and now they are saying that my wife is lying about the install date. Now I don't know when it will are ever get installed. I was standing next to her when they called and my wife asked me if Wednesday the 24th would be ok and I said that would be fine. I have other work going on in the house so I moved everything to the garage to get it out of the way. I have a bad back and a bad knee and it is very hard for me to get around. I guess we will have to see if they ever show up. Cindy is a great person to work with but I can't say much for the rest of the people who work there.

name: Maddie Sykes
text: Absolutely fantastic company! Their materials and products are beautiful and customer service is always friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

name: Susan Jones
text: My experience was terrible with the sales rep. The Tile Installer (Olan)that actually put the tile into two of our showers was AWESOME!!  If you could possibly  get that installer  I might would recommend them but the service was terrible with the  sales rep that we were offered.

name: Trey Maker
text: Be careful if you do business here. I had something taken from my house during installation of my floors. Scary that you can't trust people you are keeping employed!!

resp.text: Mr. Maker... I am sorry that you have had a bad experience with  a Carpetland, but I don't believe that this was our Carpetland in Dothan, Al.   We have great employees and our installers are sub contractors and they two are fabulous as well!!

name: Jules Goodman
text: Staff not helpful, did not have time for me

name: Lori Rainbolt
text: Great selection and design advice was spot on!

name: A. Hollis
text: I love to go here for all my home improvement needs, I would have given 5 stars but for the lack of associates being available for assistance and the extreme price for wood.I had to note that. Covid has made some places lose workers, maybe it will pick back up soon and the price hike on wood is ridiculous but it is everywhere you go. Customers shouldn't have to pay for all the lost business, we suffered too. Lattice $70 Lowes has always been pricier than Home Depot anyway, I guess you pay for that extra service.

name: Brannon Herzing
text: Good job. It's not like these are cheap. Why would you put this box under the other boxes I have?

name: J Martin
text: I'm not exactly sure what the deal is with this place. The lady in hardware is especially nice and knowledgeable. It's just hard to find anyone. No one seems to know where anything is, the lumber saw was broken, and just seems generally under staffed. Once I went in needing help finding a specific fitting for a pipe. There was a group of men standing there talking, and I couldn't really get any of them to help. I went to the customer service desk and waited for a page for about 10 mins. I just left. That was the first time that happened. Usually if you can find someone, they're extremely nice and helpful, but you have to hunt for them. Another time a fellow customer ended up explaining the tools I needed and where to find them because there was no one to be found. I don't really leave bad reviews, but this store needs more employees it seems like. And some serious help.

name: Michael Perry
text:
Like Home Depot - it is very extremely hard to get good assistance from store associates.  They are few and far between.  If or when you do finally get some assistance - they are extremely untrained for an area that they are not assigned to.

All associates should be highly trained in all areas of the store.  And there should be more associates to assist customers.

name: Jimmy Melvin
text: The customer service is usually on point. The only reason for the 3 stars is this location is consistently out of basic materials needed for electrical work. There have been several times I’ve had to actually look on the top shelf at overstock to find what I need if it’s even there. The store however is kept clean and aisles clear.

name: Samantha Wiley
text: Why does your website guarantee satisfaction within thirty days of a paint purchase and claim I can exchange it or get money back? I was just told by the paint desk and customer service your company does not do that. They said people come in showing the website all the time but never do it.

name: jenn0810
text: Nobody cares about customer service any more. Can’t even get someone to check out a 75 year old veteran when there are several people with their aprons on standing around talking to one another. No reason to tell someone to check themselves out and you getting paid to stand there. Absolutely ridiculous.

name: Fitzgerald Hampton
text: Had a bathroom project I was doing I needed a small havksaw and extra blades.  I found everything with no problem made the purchase and left the store. Had no customer associate interaction whatsoever. Which goes back to me saying that Lowe's has very limited amount of associates working throughout the day in each department and they don't have anyone to help customers when needed.

name: Valrie Niblett
text: Lots of parking easy entry and exit handicapped accessibility clean clean restrooms helpful employees I went to look at plants they had a large variety I was pleased at the prices of what I bought.I went inside and found a plant to put in a seashell I had brought home from the beach that was a surprise.I noticed they had everything to turn your outdoors into your own oasis.Grills canopies plants furniture firepits torches and so much more.Happy hunting always check your local stores website for great deals

name: Billy Hughes
text: While exceptionally stocked, what I needed was not in stock. Still love building supply stores.

name: Chef Daniel Chapel
text: Today was 🌞,all the flowers and plants displays were vivid. Ppl like being outdoors gardening. Lowe's is great for gathering 👍 supplies that will help in the diy tasks around your yard.

name: Mega Boombox
text: I walked in this store to buy only 1 item. There was a store employee right at the front door stocking shelves and I asked for help. He stopped what he was doing and located my item . Now my item was on a shelf 25 feet up . He located a lift to get my 1 item . My shopping was finished in 5 minutes. Store was clean and employees very helpful. I will return.

name: Timothy Groff
text: Went in with out a mask and got everything I need without a hassle. Even got hassle free help finding a few items. Real friendly folks

name: Suthrn67
text: Was looking for a floor mat that helped make it not so hard to stand on your feet and found one there. Lady there was so helpful but then she got so busy

name: Marchello Perkins
text: Been waiting on install and still nothing! Tried calling, no amswer! Finally got someone, then transferred and call dropped! Talked to someone and they said handled. Multiple installers out, lol, how bout they don't have all of items needed. Go to store, Multiple times because I can't get anyone on phone to help, only to see employees doing nothing, probably why no assistance on the phone. Same manager(Donovan) walking around not managing and still no install. Thanks for the horrible experience of shopping. Smh...we have to get someone who knows what value is...them folks in there...nvm

name: Camron Morgan
text: Can't get anyone to help or answer a phone. Had items delivered to my house and they are busted up. Usually pretty understanding of these things but this is by far some of the worst service I have ever experienced. After a late order and being told they would deliver on another day of my choice it still comes on a different day and multiple items broken. I cannot suggest using this location for any delivery purposes.

name: Gregory Tremble Jr
text: My #1 Home 🏡 Renovations Location Lowe's n Fultondale, Al n Appreciate The Excellent Services As Always. 💯

name: Jessica Lacey-Golden
text: Nicely organized. Was asked several times for help and they had everything I was looking for.

name: Steven Brown
text: I've gone here for many years now. Even used them to FILL UP the Home I had built. All Appliances, Draperies and Accessories, Large Utility Sink for Laundry/Mud Room. Plus Garage Door Opener and all Yard Tools...they gave me a Tremendous Buy for it ALL!! THANKS LOWES HOME IMPROVEMENTS...I WILL BE BACK!! 😊

name: Kilroy 5150
text: They seem to be genuinely nice people. But it always seems as if there is more demand than they have people to cover.

name: Tremaine Sudduth
text: I’ve never had this problem before but my family and I were in the garden section at Lowe’s in Fultondale. We were the only 3 in that section and we heard over the intercom customer service needed in the garden section. We haven’t pressed any button to call for help or anything. Next thing we see like 3 Lowe’s employees walking around watching us like we were trying to steal freaking plants! They literally followed us until we went to self checkout. Then more started gathering around watching while we were checking out. I feel like they were racial profiling by sending that many employees to follow us and I felt very uncomfortable

name: Kevron Jimerson
text: Great selection, but related items are not located together. Example: Faucets are in one area while washer assortment kit is located near the front of the store.

name: Tracie Brasher
text: Price clearly stated above product but product range up wrong  manager said price has to be on actual product for him to give it for that price. Nothing in the store has price on actual product hardly. Spent over an hour and still unresolved.

name: C Tuck
text:
If I could give zero stars I would!

So, in 2017, We had Lowe’s install new gutters with gutter guards (at their suggestion). We noticed that our roof above our front door has started to leak even more now, so we called our insurance about it. They checked it out, confirmed there was damage. Referred someone who could get the job done. Simple, claim stuff. The guy who is replacing our roof observed that the gutters were actually installed wrong and are causing water to sit on my roof AND rotting the wood underneath the shingles. LOWES will not do anything about it because of when they were installed and because they went through a contractor. SMH. Wish I’d known that before I bought all my bathroom remodeling supplies from them, I will no longer buy from Lowe’s. They have installed carpet in my house, through contractors before, I never thought I would have to go behind them and check accuracy and quality! I have my living room and kitchen that I am gettin ready to remodel, sadly I’ll have to shop elsewhere! I am a very DISAPPOINTED customer!

name: Catherine Owens
text: Best customer service I have received in a long time.

name: Ray Blackwell
text:
Didn't have what I was looking for.
Got something else instead.
Place was busy as all get out.
But plenty of people working in the store. They made a suggestion for a different item. Make a purchase on it.
Hope it's close to the same thing.

name: Jim Anderson
text:
Called before I drove 40 minutes to see if they had what I was looking for, Waited on hold for over 30 minutes trying to get someone to pick up the phone in the appliance department, never did pickup.
The Operator that I dealt with was very rude  and proceeded to tell me it was not her job to do anything but answer the phone.
Finally drove 40 minutes to the store and they did not have what I needed,it would have been very nice to have known that before I went.
I mean seriously I will try and never do business with these people again.

name: Cordelia Copelin
text: Great place stocked with all the beautiful flowers and anything else for your home.

name: Angela Hayes
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. Well stocked and returns are smooth and easy.

name: GA Cowboy
text: Very good variety of Flowers and garden materials. Easy check out and friendly employee's.

name: James Rice
text: I am continuously calling about a questions about a problem with my appliance delivery.  This is my 10th call today and NOBODY ANSWERS the phone in any department.  When someone did answer, I was placed on hold and then the phone dropped.  In fact, I have just been transferred by the 2nd person who answered and still, nobody will pick up the phone and my call was just dropped once again. What is going on here?   Very unprofessional.  Back to Home Depot.  Will try not to use Lowes and certainly not Fultondale ever again.

name: Sky G
text: I am a huge fan of Lowes as a whole, and typically have pleasant dealings in their storefronts.  I recommend you stay away from this location if you desire any sort of customer service assistance.  It is dismal to say the least. Maybe 1 in 20 employees understands what it takes to work in retail.

name: Anthony Seymour
text:
Staff was helpful until I had to cut my own lumber.

Cashier at the register almost freaked out when I pulled a 50 to pay for the lumber as she claimed she didnt have any ones.

You may want to work on that Lowes!!

name: The Diary of Bruce Adonis Dailey
text: I cant remember the lady with the short salt and pepper hair in the garden center name. She is an asset to the gardendale location!

name: Keith Davis
text: Great staff willing to lend a hand to figure out your project

name: Yvonne Farley
text: Easy to find anything you are looking for clean store employees are very helpful and respectful

name: Jeffrey Malone
text: Very hard to find help. And when I did find some they didn't know what they were doing.

name: Tisha Thompson
text: No matter the location, nor the state it is extremely hard to get assistance when in any Lowe’s store! Other than Ms Linda, who was so very helpful, when purchasing appliances, this store lacks in good customer assistance!

name: susan graves
text: Good people work there. Friendly and nice

name: Jennifer Dunn
text: It's great to have a one stop place  like Lowe's, however it's very hard to get an employee to help. I have had good service at in the paint department though.

name: Aimee Warren-Mitchell
text: It was extremely crowded. No assistance at the paint department.  Cashier upfront was kind.

name: Tisha Thompson
text: No matter the location, nor the state it is extremely hard to get assistance when in any Lowe’s store! Other than Ms Linda, who was so very helpful, when purchasing appliances, this store lacks in good customer assistance!

name: Roy Holmes
text: Very...Very...Very Pleased....Just was approved for a card so I was trying to purchase with the temporary card you can download...We was having a problem doing the transaction but the 2 ladies that help me didn't give up until we was able to finish the transaction correctly. These 2 women was friendly and very professional.

name: Charlie Ellis
text: The inter net said you had 12 wheel barrows available but you had none ready for pickup. I feel it says available they should be ready for pick up.

name: Norman Brooks
text: Typical Lowes Fultondale spent almost 2 hrs trying to get 2 pallets of sand after I called the manager and asked him to go ahead and pull the order. This is the worst Lowes I have ever dealt with.

name: Joyce Wohn
text: The 4 star is for the store not her. As a first time getting paint at that store,and a new customer, the lady behind the paint counter was Rude, not knowing what to do lines and the such, I waited and finally she said,  if you want paint go to that window she pointed, we told her  we in area didn't seem to change her attitude. Gave color needed and.finised shopping. Picked up paint , not realizing she left set paint on side of can. What a mess, didn't notice the paint, she should have. I never got paint from a store like that. It shows she doesn't care.

name: Edward Pettway
text: The workers were honest, helpful. I will be back, for more shopping

name: Judi Castro
text:
Went to find some fall perennials and for the most part found what I was looking for.  It was labor day and I was surprised it wasn't really busy.  I had a list of plants I was interested in getting. Found all but one. Unfortunately help was as elusive as the plant was. Shree was our checkout person and she was very sweet and was only one working.  We purchased an item that she placed in a bag and I forgot to ask for it and Shree forgot to get it off the round.
Still a lovely day to go plant shopping.

name: Robert Metcalfe
text: Good prices. Service a little slow but they were busy.

name: Joyce Wohn
text: The 4 star is for the store not her. As a first time getting paint at that store,and a new customer, the lady behind the paint counter was Rude, not knowing what to do lines and the such, I waited and finally she said,  if you want paint go to that window she pointed, we told her  we in area didn't seem to change her attitude. Gave color needed and.finised shopping. Picked up paint , not realizing she left set paint on side of can. What a mess, didn't notice the paint, she should have. I never got paint from a store like that. It shows she doesn't care.

name: Melinda Furniss
text: Lowe's is always a great place to find home improvement items.

name: Naomi Rodick
text: This store is very well stocked with friendly helpful staff. Also very clean and tidy!

name: Sheree Paige
text: Love the customer service..will go there all the time

name: james Lawley
text: Always has a great selection of everything.

name: Karen Shaver
text:
We went to Lowes in Fultondale Al.  We went looking for freezers to look at before we buy.  No large freezers on display (above a 7 cu ft).

In appliances,  Ailes were blocked, couldn't get to appliances easily.  Employees work and personal attire was laying on displays and merchandise (saw employee get into his backpack and shirt for phone).  I haven't seen this Lowes look so bad.

name: Chaz Garner
text: Every time I’ve come here I’ve gotten superior customer service. They are on the ball for sure.

name: Sheila Strickland
text: Found everything I went to get. They have a large variety for indoors and outdoors.

name: Allen Brice
text: I was using a certain paver for several, incomplete, projects. Lowes stopped carrying them last fall. So, now I need to find another to replace them. The competition has a similar item, but is different in size. There will be a visible break, but can't be avoided. Sorry Lowes, thought I could depend on you.

name: Debra Washington
text: Great! Picked up more than I visited for 😉😉😉😉😉

name: Ryan Iversen
text: Everybody standing around with one lane open. While they got 10 people waiting in line.

name: vpmema
text: I have just called Lowe’s in Fultondale 5 times. The phone rang for 5 min each time and once it hung up on me. I called Home Depot to see how long it would take there, 1 min 19 seconds! Lowe’s needs to learn a few things from them. I still never got hold of anyone. I’m trying to find status of appliance order done a few mths ago. Sad the store has gone down hill lately.

name: Stephanie Cornwell
text: Always enjoy looking around. Extremely busy today!!

name: lisa bailey
text: I was looking for me some wood to fix my jewelry box.

name: Mr. D
text: Pretty sad how this location has gone downhill over the last few years. It used to be one of the best in the county. Not anymore.

name: Ray Moore
text: Waited 20 minutes for help after asking for assistance. I was told to wait in the grill section. No response, I will be spending my money elsewhere.

name: Joseph Hudson
text: Will not answer the phone. Posts they have merchandise in stock but do not.

name: Alabama's FinestTM (itzNLz)
text: Staff members need to return to sales customer interaction training. If they are tired of people, they should clock out...

name: Rachel Davis
text:
I am giving 5 STARS to Jay! My first experience picking out paint was great! I truly appreciate his customer service and patience. He literally explained different textures and shades of paint. Lowe’s will definitely get my services due to Jay’s kindness.

To the guy who decline to help.. Thank you for allowing me to receive service from someone helpful. :) I hope you learn that customer service comes before stocking.

name: Mr. D
text: Pretty sad how this location has gone downhill over the last few years. It used to be one of the best in the county. Not anymore.

name: Robin McSwain
text: It was fine. Found what I wanted.

name: Mark Doty
text: Store was a little disheveled. No employees to be found except for the checkout.Had some questions about some items couldn't find anyone to ask. Fortunately I was able to use the app and find one I needed but that took a while because in large buildings like that cellular reception is spotty at best.

name: Larry Savage
text: Like most of the big box home improvement stores...customer service could be better!

name: Aubrey Morrow
text: Excellent customer service all the way around.

name: Ray Moore
text: Waited 20 minutes for help after asking for assistance. I was told to wait in the grill section. No response, I will be spending my money elsewhere.

name: Steve
text: Bought a defective craftsman chainsaw. Couldn't return it I because cranked it. There return policy says if your not satisfied you can return it. Rude service

name: Pastor Sam Baker
text: Had what I needed. In and out quickly

name: THUNDERBIRD!!
text: Great store.Be praying for all effected by 2021 jan tornado🙏 They are open and still serving the public.Much respect!! Very kind staff!

name: Nate Rice
text: I was stranded in there parking lot an a few Associates give me a hand

name: Satin Touch Experience
text: All my flip materials come from lowes best place ever

name: Linda James
text: I went to purchase an 8 ft ladder that was in stock according to your website and it wasn't there and your associate was no help at all.

name: Courtney Hill
text: Good and clean. Need more sales associates in appliance section. Will was great help to us.

name: James Love
text: There were about 10 people in red vests standing around, yet no one would help with my pick up order. Worst customer service anywhere

name: cortney Kelley
text: The workers was helpful and took me right to the place and recommended items to go along with it.

name: barry collier
text: Don't keep it stocked. Rude employees. Very disappointed.

name: Joe Smith
text:
Can’t ever get anyone to answer the phone. Lowe’s website tells you to call to confirm if an item is in stock, what a joke! They operate without care because they are the only game in town. We need a Home Depot in north Birmingham. This is not a reflection of the employees. It is a reflection of the store manager. He exceeds store financial objectives purely because locals have no other choice. Competition would be a game changer!

I will continue to drive to Trussville Home Depot where customer service is first class.

name: Leslie Calvert
text: While i love my tree it's a little pricey this year for real for a 6 foot tree this close to Christmas

name: Jackie Dickerson
text: The person who helped me load my fertilizer acted like it was a burden. Although it was his job. That's not a good experience for a costumer.

name: MICHAEL HOLMES
text: Great store and they offer military discounts

name: Dana Smith
text: The cashier was very nice! Yall need more like her

name: Bruce Collinge
text: Where very helpful. Got the grass catcher for my riding mower off the top shelf very quickly, loaded it on a cart, and took to the truck and loaded it for me.

name: JM Brett
text: They followed me around like I was going to steal

name: Veronica Rhodes
text: Was able to get what I needed  there a good inventory.

name: Pamela Metcalf
text: I'm a lady...could not get anyone to help...& I had,all my COVID shots + wearing  my Mask..oh there was people(workers)standing around talking with 1 another & the Look...they gave you for interrupting them...knocked me backwards...so I just left .. it will be a good while...if I never even go back....

text:
Need to get registers open
Extremely slow checkout

name: r.l. mcsherdon
text: I,ve never been there by my own needs

name: Gene Floyd
text: As with so many of these big box stores...You can't find or need help with an item and all the employees disappear. Was looking for the garage door openers today, saw an employee and made eye contact. As I walked toward him he quickly turned around and took off down another aisle. What the hell?

name: Greg Hicks
text: I usually shop at that Lowe's but recently it seems like the prices are raised every week I have now decided to shop at oneonta discount lumber at least the prices are competitive

name: David Ray

Need to get registers open

name: Linda Storey Moon
text: The Lowe's located in Fultondale the service was terrible the staff was rude when looking for a specific item. Not helpful at all.

name: Larry Cooper
text: Got what  I needed to complete my project.

name: Terry Stephenson
text: 3 times in 30 minutes we have requested assistance in wire cutting.  3 times help has been summoned.  No one has come out.  I don't guess that they really want to sell wire here.  Its pitiful frankly.

name: Toby Joiner
text: There is never an associate to be found to help you.  And if you have them call for one it takes 10 minutes for someone to show up.

name: Ashley Dominguez
text: Not great BUT not bad either. Only 1 out of the 6 employees I encountered spoke to me and actually "attempted" to help and by help I mean: "Um I'm pretty sure that's on aisle 2.", and then walked away. Just need to be more customer focused, there is always time to put up merchandise.

name: David Ray
text: Staff is very nice and helpful. Prices could be better.

name: Jacob Heidkamp
text: Not following mask mandate. Every time the employee helping me spoke he pulled his mask off. No reason. Don't go in person. They are not being responsible or safe.

name: Toby Joiner
text: There is never an associate to be found to help you.  And if you have them call for one it takes 10 minutes for someone to show up.

name: Jonathan Bates
text: It's close to the house and sells lumber!!!  A bit shy on knowledgeable staff, or staff in general.  Seems to rely on vendors to show customers anything. They had several extremely knowledgeable employees a few years ago, but they also had cashiers too then....  Nothing says thanks for spending hard earned money here like shoving it into a black box after you had to scan and bag your own stuff....

name: Jacob Heidkamp
text: Not following mask mandate. Every time the employee helping me spoke he pulled his mask off. No reason. Don't go in person. They are not being responsible or safe.

name: tom Phillips
text: I was very disappointed in seeing face masks not being worn by more than several customers and no store representatives enforcing the requirement.  I also saw several employees not covering their nose with their mask and others with no mask at all such as the cashier in lumber.   It is time for the adults in the room to step up and do the right thing!

name: Wayne
text: I know what I need when I come here. For the most part I know where to go to find it. When something is out of stock or it hadn't been restocked yet surely the employee working in the areas should know their areas well enough to know how to find it's temporary location or if it has been reordered within a reasonable amount of time without having to find several others just to ask how to find it. I could of done it myself on their website on my phone. So what is their presence for?  I'm all for jobs but paying someone to just work there only drives the cost up to customers.

name: Kacey Cottingham
text: Nice employees found what I needed..👍

name: Todd “Uhuru” Eaton
text: As always Lowe's bail me out. They had what I needed and at a reasonable price. Sure hate they moved from Graysville

name: Olivia Bryant
text: Absolutely better than Home Depot.

name: Jeff Mitchell
text: Great experience all around.

name: Heather Mcdaniel
text:
Whoever answers the phone for flooring is unbelievably rude. They are very short and crude. Whether or not you are having a bad day you don’t bring that to work. We had someone come out and take measurements of our floors to get a quote on how much it would cost to do our floors. The guy who took the measurements said we would hear something the next day. It’s been a week and they still  don’t have the information.

I find that hard to believe.

name: Royal Carlisle
text: Best place for home improvements equipment!!!

name: Mike Dobbins
text:
Short on help.  40 members short of full staff.
Can't  supply adequate service.

name: Palmer Richardson
text: Customer service is great

name: rosamary grice
text: Had what we needed , need to hire some people to help locate what we be looking for it is hard for old folk to walk those long floors searching for items they need assistance !

name: Marie Carey
text: Nice place to shop.

name: Ashley Childs
text: Love shopping the clearance.

name: Michelle Cornelius
text: Best customer service ever!!

name: Joe Diaz
text: Good variety..Supports the Military.

name: Corky Reed
text: Hailey at the Fultondale Lowes was friendly and helpful. People like her makes shopping there a pleasure.

name: THE ONE THEY CALL WISE
text: Davids dangerous work place. Store manager had complete disregard for safety involving forklifts and order pickers. US EMPLOYEES WANNA LIVE!!

name: Jimmie Thomas
text: Great place to get building supplies

name: Tammy D
text: A worker there had a attitude did not like her, I got some paint, was very rude,  left paint on the can, didn't wipe the can off it got on the cashier hand, she best be glad it didnt get on me, if she didnt want to be there she should have stayed at home, 🤨

name: Constance Watkins
text:
I paid for an upright freezer on 7/15/20. While in the store the clerk stated that they had 1 more left and that it could be delivered the next day.  I  waited from 8am to 8pm for the appliance.  When I finally got someone,  the appliance was not on the truck or in the store.
I was then told that it was ordered.   2 weeks  later another delivery day was set up.   By the end of the day, no freezer.      A month later received  a call and text message for next day delivery.   Again, no delivery.  By the forth call and text which was on a Sunday,  I  called the store and .o one would answer the phone.   Later that evening when I did get someone, still no product.    I called  the corporate office and complained.   I never got a call to apologize for my inconvenience. I spoke with the corporate office about getting my money back and was told the store could do it over the phone.   When I called and finally got someone to answer the phone. I  was told that I had to come in. When I got there, the clerk said they could not give me the money for the warranty.   At that point I  demanded  my money and the manager
The clerk walked off and someone else came and told me the manager was in a training meeting.  Considering All That I'd been through,  the manager should have come out.  He was the only one that could authorize the refund.   It took 2. Weeks to get my money credited back to my card.  I will never go to Lowes in GARDENDALE ever again
The service was horrible and management a joke.  If you are handicap this is not the store to go to.  90 days of lies and he'll is what I got.  Considering that the merchandise was paid for and my account FLAGGED TO give a phone call on updates, I received NOTHING.
VERY POOOOOR SERVICE.

name: Meredith Burgett
text: Went in to purchase wood for a bedroom and the sales associate was super helpful and made it a flawless process.

name: Leann Talley
text: If I could give no stars I would. Supposed to have a Refrigerator delivered on 4-22-2020, they called said the truck was down ok that’s fine was told I would get it the next day. I had to go to the store to find out what was going on because the can’t bother to answer phones was told I couldn’t get it till Sunday. Told them to give me my money back it was processed then they tell me it will take 7 days for my money to be back. NEVER AGAIN WILL I BUY ANYTHING FROM THERE

name: Pat Lively
text: One check out person at 1:15 on a Saturday with about 14 people in line. Self  check out wasn't any better. Several people just got out of line and left.

name: Elizabeth G Stratton
text: Please never go to this Lowe’s. We’ve ordered carpet and storm door from them and both times they messed up our order. They also would not fix their mistake. Worst customer service ever.

name: Leonard Kitchin
text: I shop at Lowes often, the draw back I have is they don't stock enough products in backstock and I have to go to Homedepot.

name: Larry Brown
text: Great Selection!

name: Kayla Nash
text: I ordered a curbside pickup. Yes it says to wait till an email is sent to pick it up but I was already  nearby, so I decided to wait. In the hour and a half I sat here.... 1 person was brought their pickup. If I saw more activity, I would understand but 1 in an hour and a half!!!

name: Ziggy Z
text: Great variety, great customer service, neat and clean.. They have a lovely assortment of plants and flowers

name: Stephen Brown
text:
I like this lowes. They have a great selection and they're conveniently located. Only problem is they almost ALWAYS have everything Kobalt up in top stock. And with the exception of 1 or 2 people, no one seems interested in looking for it. They just say "we don't have it". So I routinely go and find it myself, and ensure I go back to the same employee that didn't want to work, and tell them I found it for them. The look on their face is always amusing.

Other than never having their HOUSE brand actually on the shelf, I enjoy shopping here.

name: Jesus Tejeda
text: I was going to buy 2x10x12 pressure treated wood and needed to have it cut in half but they said since it was treated wood they couldn’t cut it cuz it messed up they saw and they didn’t have a special blade to cut treated wood lol, really i guess they need to call home depot to see if they sell blades for pressure treated wood...

name: Lucretia McCarter
text: Found the flowers that I was looking for to plant. Very nice customer service!

name: Joe Glazier
text:
Have to say I wS pretty disappointed on this trip.  This store has gone way downhill in the past few months.  I went to the lumber department to price wood for a project. A full third of the bins were empty.  The sad thing is that what they did hqve out was in the wrong place!  2x6x10 where the 4x6x12 should have been.  All of it was like this.  It was impossible to tell what the price was on anything!

Throughout the store, asiles were blocked by pallet jacks or buggies, making navigation difficult at best.  To think I drove nearly an hour just to go here....

name: Joshua Dendy
text: A handful of good people overshadow the plethora of awful ones.

name: Jan Mooney
text: Didn't have the size light bulbs, a small part to fix my lamp and not the size filters for my furnace. Very disappointed.

name: Therese O'Hara
text: Worker helped us right away when he saw us looking around

name: Courtney Lawson
text: Slowest company!!!!!! Curbside here is a joke. Took 40 mins.... 🙈🙈🙈

name: Layneigha Kinnaird
text: Joined the Pros Services and very first order was damaged by delivery driver as well as damage to my property.  Buyer beware because Lowe's corporate has not been easy or pleasant to deal with on the damage claim.  Closing my Pros account and will be shopping at Home Depot.

name: Lazlow Wandschneider
text: I like Lowe's a lot. If you are going to shop there often get a Lowe's card and you get 5% off every time you buy anything. 10% off on special weekends. Pay it off every month and it's like free money.

name: Lara Polk
text: They have all kinds of stuff. Unfortunately this day it was one of those days to stand in line they didn't have much help. I'm sure we'll be back though.

name: Derick Baker
text: Great experience, had what I needed. Although this stores parking lot is way too small, makes it dangerous while wheeling your purchase.

name: Susan Pollitz
text: Always find just what I need very clean store !!

name: Kathy Hester
text: We were at Lowe's to check out the spring flowers. They have a beautiful selection! Everyone I spoke with was so helpful, knowledgeable and friendly. Thanks Lowe's!!  🌺🌷🌸🌼🌹

name: ANTHONY HAMILTON
text: Awesome customer service

name: Dr. D
text: I purchased a stove and everything that could go wrong did and with terrible customer support. First they never called me to confirm my delivery date of my product. I found it online which was a Monday. Well they showed up Sunday unannounced. Lucky i was there but unfortunately there was a dent. I called that day to Lowes Online Customer Support which stated someone will call me from the store that it was fulfilled to fix the problem. I called the store this time and they wanted me to uninstall everything and just give me a whole new one which i stated that I couldn't do that because i paid someone to connect everything which would mean that i would have to pay them again. She stated that they couldn't help me with that. I finally convinced them to just order the storage shelve that was dented and it would maybe take 2 months. At this point Im like whatever. They get me to Chris the appliance guy and he states that they have a whole unit in stock and they would deliver that shelve to me the next day. I was happy and ready to put this behind me. If only it was that easy. Chris stated that someone would call me the next morning to inform me of the time frame that day for delivery. They never called or showed up. That was Monday. I have been calling multiply time today to try and get this resolved but no one is answering their phone in the delivery department. Very frustrated and wish this issue would be fixed already

name: Layla Hening
text: Hit or miss if there is customer service available but nice store all in all

name: Marquis C Jones Sr.
text: Awesome experience today... I love it at this Lowe's

name: Joshua Baker
text: Found the exact ceiling tiles I needed. Reasonable in price.

name: preston davis AL
text: Good store hours I can go in before work if I need something

name: Katie Malone
text: I recently purchased appliances for the first time from Lowe's. This was the worst experience I have ever had with a store - big or small. After multiple set up deliveries that never showed, I had to call the store, spend way too long on the call carousel, and ultimately had to take my complaints to corporate. When they were forced to call me back, I felt like my problems had been resolved, and my appliance would be delivered. The next day, I received an email that my fridge was ready to be picked up. After calling the store AGAIN, it was finally sorted out. I think I got lucky and spoke to someone who cared that it had been nearly two months of waiting. After the microwave with the original delivery didn't fit my space, Lowe's in Fultondale denied my return on day 57 of 60 with no reasoning except that their "policy had just changed." I will no longer shop at Lowe's. What a nightmare.

name: Jay Em Gee
text: I could live here. Selection is bomb staff is e extremely helpful and knowledgable. Prices hiiiii high

name: Charles Vanhorn
text: What is there to say, this is a toy store for adults.

name: MB Mack
text: I always gave a good experience here but the only problem besides the wood shortage, which isn't their fault, was that the wood they did have was not very organized and labeled. I also had to go to the parking lot for a cart.

name: Amanda Lance
text:
I've tried to call Lowe's for days. I walk into Lowe's today and trying to ask for help while watching 2 separate employees goof off. One boy even hanging with his friend while I waited for help. And after one guy helped me and rushed to finish with me and gave me the wrong part so he could get back to his friend.
I saw customersreluctant to engage him because they thought he was also with a customer who was actually the friend. they were making plans for what they wanted to do after he got off.

name: Jack Logan
text: Too crowded not enough help

name: Keith Sweatt
text: Was the worst I've ever seen...but y'all don't realy care. Don't know why I'm doing this...

name: Rebecca Parks
text: Lowe's is the best place to go for all your home projects. All the employees are so nice and willing to help you find what you are looking for. The store is always clean there is no clutter, everything is where it's supposed to be.

name: bald37red Yahoo. red
text: A LOVELY PLACE TO SHOP AND AND GET YOUR CHURCH SUPPLIES AND HOME SUPPLIES BIGMAMA LOVE IT AMEN AMEN AMEN 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡❤❤❤❤🙏🙏🙏

name: J
text:
I shop here often. I have found the employees to be helpful and able to direct me to the right person if they themselves do not know the answer to my question.  I buy my lumber from here for home projects and yard supplies. I also purchase plumbing, hardware and some tools here as well. Good location for where I live and most often they have what I need in stock. Some time I will come to just look and see what has changed.
I like this location. Two thumbs up!

name: Henry Strevy
text: No one knows their sections where they work

name: Herman Carter (Sonny)
text: Very good store good selection staff was very helpful

name: T-WON Price
text: Always a pleasure shopping there. Everyone is professional and courteous and everything is easy to find.

name: Kenneth Stewart
text: After searching for half an hour for a sliding door locking bar and no one willing to help I will not be back.

name: Reauchann Richardson
text: Beautiful plants but i did not get them. I am a regular at Lowes. Lol

name: Tonya Sanders
text: I went to this location to buy a washer, the guy in appliance was all over the place to busy to help anyone. I finally got his attention long enough for him to tell me they are sold out of washers. That they only had one left. Well I got the one they had. Waited a week to get it delivered when it arrived it was dented up, I sent it back they brought me another out. After getting it in and hooked up and reading the manual on it it wasn’t what I was looking for. I might would have realized that had the guy that was half way helping us wouldn’t have been so pushy on us making our mind up. I called them over an hour with no answer are they would pick up and hang up. So I went down there the manager was outright rude and rolled her eyes at me. Finally got some help in getting it scheduled for pick up and refunded. So I went to the Loews in Trussville to get another washer because this location said the same thing we are sold out. Fultondale was supposed to pick this washer up today and Trussville bring my new one out. Fultondale still has not picked up their washer yet and I have tried to call for over an hour and no answer or the hang up on me. I am a manager and know how busy and crazy it can be but that is why you have employees with good customer service skills to help. Fultondale dose not have good management or customer service.

I asked for a refund and went to my car, I sat in Lowe’s parking lot and placed an online order  at Home Depot and received a text within an hour and a half that my order was already ready for pickup.

Will never use Lowe’s (especially in Fultondale) again!

name: Jacqueline Dorris
text: This Lowes really needs to work on their employee culture and overall customer service. Over the past several years, my husband and I have purchased several large appliances. All of which were a nightmare of an experience.  No communication about delivery and expectations once your item is paid for. No delivery confirmations/calls from the "warehouse". The first items were a washer and dryer and fridge - they showed up 2 days late. Frustrating considering we needed the items urgently AND we took time off to be there at delivery time. Most recent was a dishwasher. The man in the back who sold us the dishwasher seemed like he would rather be anywhere BUT work. Honestly, we would have walked right out if it wasn't for the fact that I had some rewards to use at Lowes. He gave no information and in fact, told me I should "search online and compare dishwashers" because he wasn't an expert and didn't have a say on any of them. Then we asked about delivery. He had no info - not even on the process and we explained we had a bad experience before. Instead of sticking up for or explaining to us that maybe it was a fluke, he went on to talk about the "warehouse" and how many complaints they get on them. Not very reassuring. Our dishwasher didn't show up today so we will be canceling our order and we just opened a Home Depot account - so Lowes, you have lost a customer.
